title: Accepted
shortSummary: A college reject creates a fake university--complete with degrees in partying--that becomes an instant hit in this raucous comedy.
summary: A college reject creates a fake university--complete with degrees in partying--that becomes an instant hit in this raucous comedy. With a spaced-out 'dean' and classes specializing in such diverse subjects as skateboarding, the South Harmon Institute of Technology quickly becomes a hit--until the humorless dean of an actual nearby college gets wind of the scheme.

shortTitle: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
shortSummary: eaningadcap moose and his trusty squirrel sidekick head into the real world to thwart a devious plot in this live-action/animated comedy.
summary: The madcap moose and his trusty squirrel sidekick head into the real world to thwart a devious plot in this live-action/animated comedy. Rocky & Bullwinkle have been living off residual checks, but they jump back to active cartoon duty when their nefarious enemies--Boris, Natasha and their Fearless Leader--scheme to dumb down America even further with RBTV: Really Bad TV!

title: Agent Cody Banks
shortSummary: High-school student Cody Banks (Frankie Muniz) must juggle spy-jinks with schoolwork when he's recruited for a mission by the CIA.
summary: High-school student Cody Banks (Frankie Muniz) must juggle spy-jinks with schoolwork when he's recruited for a mission by the CIA. Hilary Duff co-stars as the pretty scientist's daughter whom the lady-shy Banks is charged with wooing as part of his assignment in this high-energy comedy adventure.

title: Alacran enamorado (Scorpion in Love)
shortSummary: An angry young man who joins a neo-Nazi organization is transformed when he falls in love and begins training to become a boxer.
summary: An angry young man who joins a neo-Nazi organization is transformed when he falls in love and begins training to become a boxer.

title: Alex & Emma
shortSummary: An author with a severe case of writer's block hires a stenographer to help him finish a do-or-die manuscript in this romantic comedy.
summary: Luke Wilson and Kate Hudson team up as an author with a severe case of writer's block and the typist who gives him some much-need inspiration. With bookies and his editor breathing down his neck, Alex (Wilson) is feeling the pressure until he hires Emma (Hudson)--a sweet typist whose inspiration and ideas become far more valuable than her stenography.

title: Alice Telefilm Part 1: The First Day of the Rest of My Life
shortSummary: Part 1 of 2. Two years after her arrival in Sao Paulo, Alice begins to question her newfound stability and her future.
summary: Part 1 of 2. Two years after her arrival in Sao Paulo, Alice continues her relationship with Nicholas and has begun to look for a place where they can live together. But as she goes about the apartment search and shares in the loves and uncertainties of old and new friends, what she observes leaves her far less certain of her decisions and her future.

title: Alice Telefilm Part 2: The Last Night
shortSummary: Part 2 of 2. In the wake of an argument with Nicholas, Alice has a chance encounter that transforms into a deeply affecting event.
summary: Part 2 of 2. Alice's play is a moderate success, and her friends get ready to celebrate. But when Alice discovers Nicholas flirting with a young actress, a fight starts that ends with Alice getting lost by herself in the streets of Sao Paulo. There, Alice hears a phone ringing, and a chance impersonal encounter is transformed into an event that will deeply affect her life.

title: All Access with HBO GO
shortSummary: Experience the best of HBO with HBO GO, HBO's streaming service. Free with your HBO subscription.
summary: Experience the best of HBO with HBO GO, HBO's streaming service. Watch every single episode of your favorite HBO series, and enjoy hundreds of new hits and classic movies--anytime, anywhere. Free with your HBO subscription.

title: And the Band Played On
shortSummary: Matthew Modine is a young doctor who tracks a deadly epidemic halfway around the world in this medical thriller.
summary: A deadly epidemic is spreading around the world. But when it first began, no one paid attention. Matthew Modine stars in this medical thriller as a young doctor tracking the disease halfway around the world and across two continents--and whose work is thwarted at every turn by fear, official indifference and bitter medical rivalries.

title: Angel Rodriguez
shortSummary: An intimate drama about the complicated relationship between a social worker and the bright but troubled teenager she tries to help.
summary: From HBO Films comes this intimate drama about the complicated relationship between two very different people--a 30-something social worker (Rachel Griffiths of HBO's 'Six Feet Under') and the bright but troubled teenager (Jonan Everett) she tries to help--as they reach respective turning points in their lives.

title: AninA
shortSummary: A little girl whose name is a palindrome fights back against a bully, landing both of them with a strange punishment in this animated tale.
summary: Anina is a little girl whose name is a palindrome--and it's that very fact that gets her relentlessly teased. When she fights back against a bully, both kids are given a unique punishment: they are each given a black envelope that they cannot open for one week. Over the course of those seven days, both come to learn a bit about themselves in this animated tale.

title: Another Me
shortSummary: A high-school teen finds herself haunted by a scary doppelganger in this eerie creepfest. Sophie Turner stars.
summary: Just when it seems nothing could get worse for high-school teen Fay (Sophie Turner), she finds herself haunted by a doppelganger in this eerie creepfest. As she deals with an increasingly unsettling series of events--both natural and supernatural--Fay's search for answers into her scary double exposes her to a terrible truth about her past.

title: As You Like It
shortSummary: Kenneth Branagh's exotic adaptation of Shakespeare's delightful stage comedy in which a courtship plays out in the Forest of Arden.
summary: All the world's a stage--and Kenneth Branagh captures it all in this exotic HBO Films adaptation of William Shakespeare's delightful comedy. Witty, playful and utterly magical, the film centers on the celebrated courtship between Rosalind and Orlando as it plays out against a backdrop of rivalry, banishment and exile in the Forest of Arden--all set in 19th-century Japan!

title: Atonement
shortSummary: A lie tragically changes the lives of three people in this searing adaptation of Ian McEwan's 2001 bestseller.
summary: "Four stars" (Roger Ebert). A lie tragically changes the lives of three people in this searing adaptation of Ian McEwan's 2001 bestseller. James McAvoy and Keira Knightley star as lovestruck teens from opposite social classes. When Knightley's younger sister mistakes a scene between the pair as sinister, it sets off a chain of events that changes all of their lives forever.

shortTitle: Austin Powers: Int'l Man of Mystery
title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
shortSummary: Mike Myers is the world's greatest superspy, out to prevent the ultimate plot at world domination courtesy of his devious nemesis.
summary: 'Oh Yeah, Baby!' The world's greatest super-spy is out to prevent the ultimate plot at world domination courtesy of his devious nemesis in this outrageous 1997 comedy. Mike Myers is hilarious as over-sexed, dentally challenged super-spy Austin Powers--while also portraying the megalomaniacal Dr. Evil--in this blockbuster hit that spawned two sequels.

title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
shortSummary: Steven Spielberg's masterful sci-fi tale about a child robot who undertakes a Pinocchio-like quest to become a real boy.
summary: From the minds of Steven Spielberg and the late Stanley Kubrick comes this intense, cautionary science-fiction drama about a child robot implanted with emotions. David (Haley Joel Osment) is the robot-boy who finds himself on his own with his fuzzy playmate Teddy as they undertake a Pinocchio-like search for the one being who can make him a real boy.

title: Back to School
shortSummary: Rodney Dangerfield turns higher education into a textbook case of lowbrow laughs in this riotous comedy.
summary: Look out, hallowed halls: here comes rowdy, raunchy Rodney Dangerfield to turn higher education into a textbook case of lowbrow laughs! Rodney plays a fat-cat businessman who joins his undergrad son at a fancy college. Between his co-ed hot tub parties, clinches with sexy professor Sally Kellerman and subcontracting his own term papers, who's got time for classes?

title: Baggage Claim
shortSummary: A single, 30-year-old flight attendant decides to stop flying solo and gives herself 30 days to get engaged.
summary: A perennially-single, 30-year-old flight attendant (Paula Patton) decides to stop flying solo and gives herself 30 days to get a ring on her finger after her younger sister announces her engagement.

title: Bandidas
shortSummary: Sexy outlaws Penelope Cruz and Salma Hayek go on a rampage in the name of justice in this female-buddy western.
summary: Sexy outlaws Penelope Cruz and Salma Hayek go on a rampage in the name of justice in this western. When a rich man and a peasant become targets of a greedy landowner, their respective daughters decide to get revenge! Privileged and poor become female bandits, robbing banks, intimidating some of the men in their path and winning over others--including a repressed criminologist.

title: Because I Said So
shortSummary: A mother desperately seeks a suitor for her sweet, but perpetually single youngest daughter in this romantic comedy.
summary: Single mother Daphne (Diane Keaton) has married off her two oldest girls, but as her 60th birthday approaches, she's frantic about her youngest daughter Milly (Mandy Moore). Not wanting to see the lovely girl turn into a lonely old maid, Daphne takes her daughter's love life into her own hands--even personally interviewing potential beaus--much to Milly's mortification!

title: Bedazzled
shortSummary: Brendan Fraser is a hapless geek who sells his soul to sexy devil Elizabeth Hurley in this hilarious comedy remake.
summary: A hapless computer geek attracts some sympathy from the devil in this riotous remake. This time, the devil appears in luscious female form to grant the loser seven wishes...in exchange for his soul, of course. All Elliot (Brendan Fraser) wants is happiness with a pretty co-worker, but each wish seems to lead him in the wrong direction thanks to sexy devil Elizabeth Hurley!

title: Behind the Candelabra
shortSummary: Michael Douglas and Matt Damon star in this film that recounts show-biz icon Liberace's tempestuous relationship with a young lover.
summary: Show-biz icon Liberace's tempestuous relationship with a young lover is recounted in this HBO Films production. Oscar(R) winners Michael Douglas and Matt Damon star as the entertainer and his partner Scott Thorson who lived in Liberace's opulent Las Vegas mansion from 1977 to 1982--a time when Liberace was at the height of his popularity, but remained closeted as a homosexual.

title: Belle
shortSummary: A young bi-racial woman plays a role in the abolition of slavery in 18th-century Britain in this inspiring period drama.
summary: Raised free by an aristocratic family, a young bi-racial woman plays a role in the abolition of slavery in 18th-century Britain in this period drama. Gugu Mbatha-Raw stars as Dido Elizabeth Belle, an admiral's illegitimate daughter who encounters race, gender and class issues despite her rich lineage--and who comes to influence her uncle's position in a pivotal court case.

title: Bessie
shortSummary: Queen Latifah stars as Bessie Smith in this vivid portrait of the legendary 20th century blues singer.
summary: She was the 'Empress of the Blues,' an immense talent whose love for music took her from anonymity to international fame in the 1920s blues scene. Queen Latifah stars as legendary blues singer Bessie Smith in this vivid portrait of a tenacious spirit who, despite her own demons, went on to become one of the most successful and influential musical artists of the 20th century.

title: Best in Show
shortSummary: Eccentric dog-owners scheme to win a show in this hilarious sendup of the dog-owner-eat-dog-owner world of canine pageants.
summary: Chase after this 'barkingly funny' ('Variety') sendup of the dog-owner-eat-dog-owner world of canine pageants. There, obsessive owners of all stripes--from a pair of neurotic yuppies to a down-home fly-fisherman--put their reputations on the line...and reveal their quirks in mockumentary-style interviews.

title: The Best Man Holiday
shortSummary: Long-simmering rivalries, romances and secrets are revealed when college friends gather for a joyful holiday reunion in this comedy sequel,
summary: Get ready for a "feel-good celebration" (Boston Herald), as the ensemble cast from the 1999 hit "The Best Man" returns for this comedy sequel. Getting together for the first time in years, the college friends gather for a joyful holiday reunion, only to find that long-simmering rivalries, romances and secrets are revealed.

title: The Big Bounce
shortSummary: Spirited adaptation of Elmore Leonard's novel about a small-time crook who attracts a thrill-seeking vixen with a devious plan.
summary: A trouble-prone surfer attracts a thrill-seeking vixen in this adaptation of Elmore Leonard's novel. In Hawaii to ride the waves, Jack lands in the slammer after assaulting his construction boss. After he is freed, he meets Nancy, the mistress of the crooked developer who gave Jack his job. Nancy draws Jack into her scheme for ripping off the mogul in this comic caper remake.

title: The Big Fix
shortSummary: Offbeat private eye Richard Dreyfuss tackles a tangled murder case in this humorous tale.
summary: Humor and suspense run neck and neck as an offbeat private eye takes on a tangled murder case. Richard Dreyfuss is Moses Wine, Private Detective. Tough and cynical, funny and romantic, he's a gumshoe with no money, a flighty ex-wife, a Marxist grandmother, and two young sons.

title: Birdman: Or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
shortSummary: Michael Keaton is a has-been movie star about to launch a stage show that could resurrect his career--or ruin it--in this Oscar(R) winner.
summary: Winner of four 2014 Oscars(R)--including Best Picture--this captivating and original film tells the story of a has-been action-film star as he prepares for a stage show that could resurrect his career...or ruin it. Michael Keaton, Zach Galifianakis, Edward Norton, Andrea Riseborough, Amy Ryan, Emma Stone and Naomi Watts star.

title: Black and White
shortSummary: An intriguing look at the New York City hip-hop scene from the perspective of white youths who are attracted to black culture.
summary: Director James Toback takes an intriguing look at the New York City hip-hop scene from the perspective of white youths who are attracted to black culture. Led by an eclectic ensemble cast, the film centers on a group of kids--both white and black--who are trailed by a documentary crew.

title: Black Nativity
shortSummary: Langston Hughes' beloved musical is brought to the big screen in this uplifting holiday film.
summary: Langston Hughes' beloved musical is brought to the big screen in this uplifting holiday film. Unable to support her teenage son, a young mother sends him to Harlem to live with his estranged grandparents, where he struggles to adapt and faces temptation as Christmas approaches. 'Toe-tapping holiday fare' (USA Today).

title: Blue Collar Comedy Tour
shortSummary: Its redneck laughs from start to finish in this film that captures Jeff Foxworthy, Bill Engvall, Ron White and Larry the Cable Guy on tour.
summary: Its redneck laughs from start to finish in this film that captures Jeff Foxworthy, Bill Engvall, Ron White and Larry the Cable Guy on their blockbuster stand-up tour. Between hilarious stand-up footage, see the comic quartet spending their time fishing, visiting a lingerie store, and more.

title: Bodyguard: A New Beginning
shortSummary: The loyal bodyguard of a Hong Kong Triad boss battles the boss's treacherous son, who tries to stage a coup.
summary: When the loyal bodyguard of a Hong Kong Triad boss is sent to the UK to protect a mysterious young woman, the boss's treacherous son tries to stage a coup against his father.

title: The Book of Life
shortSummary: A bullfighter and a soldier embark on an epic quest to win the hand of a free-spirited young woman in this animated fable.
summary: Visually striking animated fable centering on a bullfighter and a soldier who embark on an epic quest to win the hand of a free-spirited young woman.

title: The Book Thief
shortSummary: A little girl in Nazi Germany learns to survive the horrors she experiences through reading in this adaptation of the acclaimed novel.
summary: A little girl in Nazi Germany learns to survive the horrors she experiences through reading in this adaptation of the acclaimed novel. Taken in by foster parents, young Liesel is able to overcome illiteracy and great loss with help from her kindly foster father (an exceptional Geoffrey Rush) and a young Jewish refugee the family agrees to hide. Emily Watson co-stars.

title: Bossa Nova
shortSummary: An American widow teaching in Brazil finds love amidst the romantic confusion of everyone around her.
summary: An American widow teaching English in Brazil finds love in the person of a courtly Brazilian lawyer at the same time that various relationships--everything from May-December to Internet--begin to complicate the lives of everyone around her. Amy Irving stars in this 'delightfully amusing romantic roundelay' ('Variety').

title: The Boxer
shortSummary: A former IRA member returns to his hometown after 14 years in prison with hopes of escaping the past and restarting his boxing career.
summary: A former IRA member returns to his Irish hometown after 14 years in prison. Danny Flynn (Daniel Day-Lewis) has no interest in returning to his old ways--he wants to resurrect his boxing career. Reopening a local gym breathes life into the area, but escaping the past proves tough as he must deal with his married ex-girlfriend (Emily Watson) and some hard-line IRA mates.

title: Breakdown
shortSummary: City couple Kurt Russell and Kathleen Quinlan are plunged into a nightmare in the U.S. southwest after their car breaks down.
summary: A lonely road...a sudden breakdown...and a city couple is plunged into an unending nightmare in the American southwest. After their car breaks down, Kurt Russell accepts a trucker's offer to take his wife to the nearest town to call for help. But when he follows, she's nowhere around--and no one has seen her! 'A tough, vigorous exercise in pure action' ('New York Times').

title: The Break-Up
shortSummary: Vince Vaughn and Jennifer Aniston play an out-of-love couple whose shared apartment becomes the battlefield in their two-person war.
summary: Opposites repel in this darkly comic tale of a relationship gone awry. Vince Vaughn is a guy's guy who runs a family business; Jennifer Aniston is an elegant art-gallery manager who likes things to look perfect. The two fall in love and buy a condo together...and then fall out of love, continuing to live in the apartment that turns into the battlefield of their two-person war.

title: Broken Arrow
shortSummary: Renegade Air Force pilot John Travolta steals two nuclear warheads while his former best friend and a park ranger try to stop him.
summary: Renegade Air Force pilot John Travolta has the U.S. government over a barrel in this action epic. He's stolen two nuclear warheads and wants $250 million or he'll turn the Southwest into a wasteland! Opposing him is fellow pilot--and former best friend--Christian Slater, who teams up with National Parks ranger Samantha Mathis to track him down and neutralize the threat.

title: The Broken Hearts Club: A Romantic Comedy
shortSummary: A group of young gay friends deal with various personal struggles in this engaging romantic comedy.
summary: Set in West Hollywood, California, this engaging romantic comedy follows a group of young gay men who play softball together while dealing with the various struggles in their personal lives. 'The first mainstream gay movie that feels totally comfortable in its shoes' ('New York Daily News').

title: The Brothers McMullen
shortSummary: Three Irish-Catholic brothers deal with their respective lady troubles in this hit indie film directed by and starring Edward Burns.
summary: The three McMullen brothers have a lot in common: they're still living in the family home on Long Island and they're all having trouble with the women in their lives. This winner of the Jury Award at the 1995 Sundance Film Festival is 'a romantic comedy full of heart and humor...a solidly entertaining film with something on its mind' (The New York Times).

title: Bulletproof Monk
shortSummary: An immortal Tibetan monk takes a streetwise pickpocket under his wing to pass on a sacred scroll holding the key to unlimited power.
summary: An immortal Tibetan monk and kung fu master takes a streetwise pickpocket under his wing to pass on a sacred scroll holding the key to unlimited power that he has been guarding for 60 years. Chow-Yun Fat and Seann William Scott star in this action-packed adventure that has "a life and style that other buddy action movies lack" (San Francisco Chronicle).

shortTitle: Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee
title: Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee
shortSummary: Epic 'HBO Films' adaptation of Dee Brown's book about the subjugation and cultural extermination of the Sioux tribe in the 19th century.
summary: Beginning just after the bloody Sioux victory over General Custer at Little Big Horn, this epic 'HBO Films' adaptation of Dee Alexander Brown's nonfiction masterpiece intertwines the unique perspectives of three characters--Charles Eastman, Sitting Bull and Senator Henry Dawes--while detailing the sprawl into the American West that tragically affected American Indian culture.

title: Capturing Mary
shortSummary: The young concierge of a spooky London mansion entertains an elderly visitor in this follow-up film to 'Joe's Palace.'
summary: The young concierge of a spooky London mansion returns in this follow-up film to 'Joe's Palace.' When an elderly woman named Mary Gilbert (Maggie Smith) shows up looking for answers to events set in motion by her past experiences at the old house, Joe decides to let her in--and is taken on a journey through the house and the secrets that it holds.

title: Career Opportunities
shortSummary: A slacker takes a job at a department store and is locked in the building overnight with a beautiful girl in this comedy.
summary: At 21-years-old, Jim Dodge still lives at home, unemployed, with his parents. But Jim's father forces him to take a janitor job. Working clean-up duty doesn't suit him, but when he's accidentally locked inside the department store late one night, he entertains himself with the merchandise--until he discovers a beautiful ex-high school acquaintance hiding among the aisles.

title: Catch a Fire
shortSummary: The true story of an innocent man accused of a terrorist crime during South Africa's apartheid rule is told in this gripping drama.
summary: This is the true story of an innocent man accused of a crime during South Africa's apartheid rule. Patrick Chamusso was a foreman in a South African oil refinery when a massive explosion points to signs of terrorism in the 1980s apartheid era. With an alibi he was unwilling to give, Patrick--and later his family--was tortured and jailed for information on the bombing.

title: Catwoman
shortSummary: A murdered cosmetics company employee returns to life as a vengeful vixen with feline powers in this adaptation of the comic book.
summary: Are you ready for feline empowerment? A cosmetics company employee murdered for her knowledge of the firm's flaws returns to life as a vengeful vixen with feline powers. Halle Berry stars in this purr-fectly untamed adaptation of the comic book.

title: The Cell 2
shortSummary: A serial killer's first victim awakens from her coma with psychic abilities that enable her to enter the maniac's twisted mind.
summary: He is known as The Cusp: a serial killer who kills his victims, then brings them back to life...again and again. It's up his first victim, a survivor who awakened from a one-year coma with a psychic ability that enables her to enter the maniac's twisted mind. Tessie Santiago, Chris Bruno, Frank Whaley and Bart Johnson star in this harrowing sequel.

title: Chaplin
shortSummary: Robert Downey Jr. brings Charlie Chaplin perfectly to life in this revealing film about the legendary comedic actor.
summary: Robert Downey Jr. brings Charlie Chaplin perfectly to life in this revealing film that chronicles the life and career of the legendary comedic actor. 'Downey at his best' (Nolan's Pop Culture Review).

title: Charlie's Angels
shortSummary: The sensational update starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu as a trio of sexy, butt-kicking crime-fighters.
summary: The Angels are back! The smash '70s television show gets a lustrous big-screen treatment in this sensational update starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu as Natalie, Dylan and Alex--three butt-kicking crime fighters who light things up with their combination of martial-arts skills and sizzling looks.

title: Cinema Verite
shortSummary: The fact-based story of a Santa Barbara family who were catapulted to notoriety in the early 1970s in a groundbreaking PBS series.
summary: Decades before we had reality television, there was the Loud family. From HBO Films comes the story of the groundbreaking PBS documentary 'An American Family' which chronicled the lives of the Loud family in the early 1970s. The cameras put the Louds in the national spotlight as parents Pat and Bill grappled with their marriage while raising their children.

title: Citizen X
shortSummary: A Russian police detective faces almost insurmountable odds in his search for the most savage serial killer of modern times.
summary: A Russian detective faces insurmountable odds in his search for the most savage serial killer of modern times in this taut thriller based on a true story. Andre Chikatilo viciously murdered 52 women and children--while the government denied that a serial killer existed. But one man became obsessed with the killer and defied the official silence in order to track him down.

title: City Hall
shortSummary: A young deputy mayor finds himself in the middle of a growing storm of crime, corruption and politics in New York City.
summary: A shootout takes the lives of a cop, a mobster and a little boy and casts a young deputy mayor into the middle of a growing storm of crime, corruption and politics in New York City. Al Pacino shines as the charismatic Mayor whose idealistic underling (John Cusack) begins to uncover a shocking web of lies and deceit in the wake of the violence.

title: Class Act
shortSummary: A rich, smart nerd and a poor, streetwise guy from the 'hood trade places in class in this spirited comedy.
summary: Duncan's a rich, smart nerd who doesn't know anything about being black. Blade is a poor, streetwise guy from the 'hood. When their high school records get mixed up and they trade places in class, watch out! Kid 'n' Play ('House Party') play Duncan and Blade in this spirited comedy.

title: Clear History
shortSummary: Larry David is a disgraced former exec whose past humiliation threatens to disrupt his new life in this HBO Films comedy.
summary: Larry David stars in this HBO Films comedy as Nathan Flomm, a marketing executive at a start-up company who loses a fortune after a petty argument with his boss (Jon Hamm). The company then makes billions, leaving Nathan publicly humiliated. But even after changing his identity and moving to a small island off the Massachusetts coast, his past threatens to disrupt his new life.

title: Coffee Town
shortSummary: A website manager and his two pals hatch a screwball plan to prevent a local coffee haunt from being turned into a lounge.
summary: A website manager who works out of a local coffee house hatches a screwball plot with his two pals to stop the joint from being turned into a lounge.

title: Conspiracy
shortSummary: Kenneth Branagh and Stanley Tucci star in this story of the top-secret Nazi meeting to debate the merits of Hitler's 'Final Solution.'
summary: They came to Wannsee as high-ranking leaders of Germany's World War II effort. Two hours later, they left as co-conspirators in the murder of millions of Jews. This is the story of the top-secret Nazi meeting in which fifteen men debated--and ultimately agreed upon--the merits of Hitler's 'Final Solution,' the extermination of the entire Jewish population of Europe.

title: Contact
shortSummary: Robert Zemeckis' provocative sci-fi drama with Jodie Foster as a scientist who makes extraterrestrial contact. With Matthew McConaughey.
summary: Does alien life exist in outer space? In this provocative drama, brilliant scientist Jodie Foster believes that we are not alone, and her tireless search for extraterrestrial clues reaps magical and unprecedented results. A visually intoxicating sci-fi movie that inspires even as it fascinates. "Beautifully crafted and involving...positive and uplifting" (Variety).

title: Cop and a Half
shortSummary: An 8-year-old witness tags along with cranky cop Burt Reynolds to catch criminals in this comedy.
summary: Devon Butler may be only in elementary school, but his bright ambitions to carry a police badge may be realized sooner than he thinks. As a key eyewitness to a crime, Devon holds a big bargaining chip with longtime cop Nick McKenna (Burt Reynolds): he'll tell the police what he knows, if McKenna allows the law savvy lad to join him on the chase!

title: Corazon de leon (Lion's Heart)
shortSummary: A lawyer embarks on an unlikely relationship with a charming, successful architect who is barely four-feet tall.
summary: After losing her cell phone, a lawyer receives a call from the man who found it, and she finds herself charmed by this friendly, successful architect. But when they meet the next day, she discovers one tiny problem: he's barely four-feet tall.

title: The Cotton Club
shortSummary: Francis Ford Coppola's story of Harlem's notorious nightclub in the 1920s with Richard Gere as a musician caught up in its risky world.
summary: It was the most dazzling showplace of the 1920s, Harlem's most notorious nightclub. On one side of the footlights, fabled black performers sang, shimmied, played up a storm of jazz. On the other side, white celebrities, socialites and big guns of crime found their thrills and made their deals. Richard Gere plays a musician caught up in the Cotton Club's dangerous night world.

title: The Counselor
shortSummary: A lawyer who wants to get into the drug trade for some easy money soon finds himself caught in a nightmare of violence and treachery.
summary: A slick lawyer (Michael Fassbender) who wants to get into the drug trade for some easy money soon finds himself caught in a nightmare of violence and treachery.

title: Cristo Rey
shortSummary: In an impoverished shantytown of Santo Domingo, two half-brothers--one Haitian and one Dominican--clash over their love for the same woman.
summary: In an impoverished shantytown of Santo Domingo, two half-brothers--one Haitian and one Dominican--clash over their love for the daughter of a local drug lord.

title: Dances With Wolves
shortSummary: Kevin Costner's Oscar(R)-winning Best Picture about a Civil War soldier who finds himself as a member of the Lakota Sioux Indian tribe.
summary: Kevin Costner's Oscar(R)-winning Best Picture follows a Civil War soldier who finds himself as a member of the Lakota Sioux Indian tribe. Costner stars as Lt. John Dunbar, a war hero who is accepted by the Sioux and made a member of the tribe opening up an entirely new world to him and awakening his once-dulled soul...until the Army arrives looking for answers.

title: Dawn of the Dead
shortSummary: A zombie apocalypse leaves a small, disparate pack of survivors holed up in a shopping mall in this bloody remake of the 1979 cult classic.
summary: A zombie apocalypse leaves a small, disparate pack of survivors holed up in a shopping mall in this bloody remake of the 1979 cult classic. Sarah Polley, Ving Rhames, Jake Weber and Mekhi Phifer head up the rapidly dwindling group of the living who are forced to smash zombie skulls to avoid being turned into the living dead.

shortTitle: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
shortSummary: The time of the ape has come...while man struggles to survive in this riveting sequel to 'Rise of the Planet of the Apes.'
summary: The time of the ape has come...while man struggles to survive in this riveting sequel. Set ten years after 'Rise' when the human population has been decimated by a Simian Virus, the increasingly intelligent apes, led by wise warrior Caesar, discover a large group of human survivors. While Caesar forges a shaky peace, war mongerers on both sides lead them into violence.

title: Deliver Us From Evil
shortSummary: The Catholic Church sexual-abuse scandal is viewed from the perspective of a pedophile priest and his many victims.
summary: The Catholic Church sex-abuse scandal is viewed from the perspective of a pedophile priest and his many victims in this 2007 Oscar(R)-nominee for Best Documentary Feature. Called 'unnerving' by the New York Times, director Amy Berg's film reveals the story of Father Oliver O'Grady who preyed on children in California--while his superiors simply moved him from parish to parish.

title: The Devil Wears Prada
shortSummary: Meryl Streep and Anne Hathaway star in this hit film about a college graduate who works for the boss from hell at a fashion magazine.
summary: Recent college graduate Andy Sachs is nonplussed when she lands a job as the assistant of fashion magazine editor Miranda Priestly. Not only is plain-Jane Andy out of her league in the world of couture, but Miranda is extremely demanding. But the job leads her in some surprising new directions--including a makeover, a romance and even a little sympathy for the 'devil.'

title: Dirty War
shortSummary: This thriller takes a hypothetical look at how a terrorist 'dirty bomb' attack might be planned and executed in London.
summary: In a post-9/11 world, how do you prepare for the unthinkable? This alarming HBO Films thriller chronicles the hypothetical story of how a terrorist 'dirty bomb' attack might be planned and executed in London despite the best efforts of law enforcement--and shows how devastating such a strike would be.

title: Disconnect
shortSummary: The lives of three groups of people collide as intersecting cautionary tales explore cyber-bullying, identity theft and adult-webcam sites.
summary: The lives of three groups of people collide with devastating results as intersecting cautionary tales explore cyber-bullying, identity theft and adult-webcam sites.

title: Doctor Zhivago
shortSummary: David Lean directed this 1965 epic about a poetic doctor and his lover who are swept up in the chaos of Russia's Bolshevik Revolution.
summary: David Lean directed this epic 1965 movie version of Boris Pasternak's Nobel Prize-winning novel. Omar Sharif and Julie Christie play a poetic doctor and his lover, who are swept up in the chaos of Russia's Bolshevik Revolution. Nominated for ten Oscars(R), including Best Picture and Best Director.

title: Dolphin Tale
shortSummary: An injured dolphin makes a huge splash in the hearts of a young boy and the team that nurses it back to health in this inspiring story.
summary: An injured dolphin makes a huge splash in the hearts of a young boy and the team that nurses it back to health in this true story. For 11-year-old Sawyer, helping Winter and becoming part of the Haskett family and their struggling aquarium is a dream come true. When they are forced to amputate Winter's tail fin, their hopes of saving the creature lie in a prosthetics expert.

title: Dolphin Tale 2
shortSummary: Winter the dolphin with a prosthetic tail must be paired with new partner by her human friends at the aquarium in this sequel.
summary: Winter the dolphin is back along with her human friends at an aquarium in this 'emotional and sweet' (Roger Ebert.com) sequel. When Winter's companion dies, aquarium owner Dr. Clay Haskett (Harry Connick Jr.) and company must follow regulations and find her a new partner--or face legal ramifications. But will Winter accept the injured baby dolphin they want to pair her up with?

title: Dom Hemingway
shortSummary: Gangster Jude Law seeks recompense--and gets more than he bargained for--after taking the fall for his boss.
summary: A gangster seeks recompense--and gets more than he bargained for--after taking the fall for his boss and serving 12 years in jail. Jude Law stars as the reckless mobster who is handed a fortune in cash--only to get swindled by his boss' sexy moll.

shortTitle: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
shortSummary: A teenage girl and her four siblings are left to their own devices when their elderly babysitter drops dead in this frisky comedy.
summary: What's a girl to do when mom goes off on a long trip and installs The Babysitter from Hell? Pray! Fortunately for Christina Applegate and her four siblings, it works, and the poor lady drops dead. Just one catch--there's no money. So out the teen goes into the real world to bring home the bacon bits. Her adventures in the fast-food and fashion worlds make for frisky comedy.

title: Draft Day
shortSummary: Kevin Costner shines as an NFL GM facing pressure from all sides as he prepares to make the first pick in the draft. With Jennifer Garner.
summary: For NFL GM Sonny Weaver (Kevin Costner), the pressure is on as the draft nears: his Cleveland Browns haven't won in 50 years, he's just learned he's about to become a father...and he has to make the first pick. The wheeling and dealing go full throttle as Sonny decides between the consensus top pick everyone assumes he'll take and the two dark-horse candidates he prefers.

title: The Drop
shortSummary: Brooklyn bartender Tom Hardy gets caught up in the underworld dealings of his uncle and the Chechen gangsters who control his bar.
summary: 'Tom Hardy gives another terrific performance' (Variety) in this riveting thriller about a good-hearted Brooklyn bartender who gets caught up in the dangerous underworld dealings of his bar-owner uncle and the Chechen gangsters who control the joint--and use it for their illegal money drops. Noomi Rapace, James Gandolfini, Matthias Schoenaerts and John Ortiz co-star.

title: Duma
shortSummary: A boy and his pet cheetah wind up on an amazing adventure after they get lost in the Kalahari desert.
summary: Based on a true story, this family film chronicles the adventure of 12-year-old Xan and his cheetah Duma as they become hopelessly lost in the Kalahari desert without enough food or water to survive. Joined by another lost traveler who seems to have his own agenda, Xan and Duma undertake a journey that includes using their broken-down motorcycle as a wind-powered craft.

title: Dunston Checks In
shortSummary: A clever orangutan steals jewels, scenes and hearts as the sidekick to an ace crook in this comedy.
summary: A clever orangutan steals jewels, scenes and hearts in this 'first-class, stylish farce' ('Variety'). Dunston is crooked Lord Rutledge's simian sidekick, one of the best jewel thieves in the business. But he's tired of his larcenous life, so when they check into a posh Manhattan hotel, Dunston checks out...and into the company of the hotel manager's young son.

title: Ed
shortSummary: The country goes bananas for a chimp that takes the baseball world by storm in this family comedy.
summary: The country goes bananas for a chimp that takes the baseball world by storm in this family comedy. Jack Cooper (Matt LeBlanc) is a highly touted pitching prospect in the minor leagues whose struggling team needs some new life. Enter Ed: the team's new chimpanzee mascot (and Jack's roommate) whose surprising skills on the diamond are just the inspiration the team needs!

title: Edge of Tomorrow
shortSummary: Tom Cruise is a soldier who continuously relives the day he was killed fighting alien forces in this futuristic sci-fi thriller.
summary: Imagine 'Groundhog Day' meets 'Aliens' and you'll get this action-packed thrill-ride starring Tom Cruise. Sent to the front line in a war against alien invaders known as Mimics, Cruise is killed--only to relive the same morning over and over again. Under the guidance of a renowned warrior (Emily Blunt), Cruise uses the time loop he's in to sharpen his fighting skills.

title: Einstein and Eddington
shortSummary: The tale of the unlikely partnership between Albert Einstein and British scientist Arthur Eddington during World War I.
summary: Albert Einstein was a free-spirited Jewish renegade from Germany; Arthur Eddington was a conservative English Quaker. But these two very different, but incredibly brilliant scientists would form a long-distance partnership that would change the course of modern science forever as they collaborated to pursue new ideas that flew in the face of centuries-old tenets.

title: Elizabeth I (Part 1)
shortSummary: Part 1 of 2. HBO Films miniseries that explores the intersection of the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I.
summary: Part 1 of 2. Winner of nine Emmy(R) Awards, including Outstanding Miniseries! Helen Mirren and Jeremy Irons star in this HBO Films miniseries about the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I in the latter half of her 45-year reign. Part 1 follows the tempestuous relationship between Elizabeth and the Earl of Leicester through war, treason, illness and a French suitor.

title: Elizabeth I (Part 2)
shortSummary: Part 2 of 2. HBO Films miniseries that explores the intersection of the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I.
summary: Part 2 of 2. Winner of nine Emmy(R) Awards, including Outstanding Miniseries! Helen Mirren and Jeremy Irons star in this two-part HBO Films miniseries about the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I in the latter half of her 45-year reign. In Part 2, an older Elizabeth has a passionate affair with the young, ambitious Earl of Essex (Hugh Dancy), Leicester's stepson.

title: El Callejon (Blind Alley)
shortSummary: A young Cuban working in Spain finds herself trapped in a creepy, isolated laundromat with two serial killers.
summary: A young Cuban working in Spain finds herself trapped in a creepy, isolated laundromat with two serial killers. But after hours of being tormented in a sadistic game of cat-and-mouse, she is about to discover something even more terrifying about their identities.

title: Emma
shortSummary: High-society girl Gwyneth Paltrow plays matchmaker with varying results in this adaptation of Jane Austen's novel.
summary: A high-society girl helps her friends find love while playing matchmaker in this adaptation of Jane Austen's novel. Gwyneth Paltrow stars as Emma Woodhouse, a beautiful British society girl who makes it her duty to find her plain friend Harriet a respectable suitor.

title: Ender's Game
shortSummary: A young military cadet may be humanity's only hope against an alien invasion in this epic adaptation of the hit novel.
summary: From the epic novel comes this tale of a young military cadet who may be humanity's only hope against an alien invasion. Harrison Ford leads the desperate search for 'The One,' which appears to be in the person of Ender Wiggin (Asa Butterfield). Can this scruffy, unloved outsider be the deciding factor as an inevitable attack by the superior Formics looms?

title: Endless Love
shortSummary: The beautiful daughter of a wealthy doctor falls madly in love with the hunky son of a mechanic from the wrong side of the tracks.
summary: The privileged, beautiful daughter of a wealthy doctor falls madly in love with the hunky, hot-headed son of a mechanic from the wrong side of the tracks, much to the chagrin of her snobby father.

title: Enemy Mine
shortSummary: A human astronaut and a warrior from an enemy planet are stranded in an unfamiliar, hostile world. Dennis Quaid, Louis Gossett Jr.
summary: The value of friendship and cooperation is at the heart of this offbeat sci-fi epic. A human astronaut and a lizardlike warrior from the enemy planet Dracon find themselves stranded in an unfamiliar, hostile world. Can the Earthman (Dennis Quaid) and the Drac (Louis Gossett Jr.) overcome their personal animosity and learn to survive together?

title: Enemy of the State
shortSummary: A lawyer goes on the run after he is given a video tying a National Security Agency official to a murder.
summary: Hotshot Washington, D.C. lawyer Robert Dean learns the hard way that it's not paranoia if they're really after you. When he is given a video tying a National Security Agency official to a murder, Dean goes on the run and meets up with a mysterious surveillance expert who helps him turn the tables on corrupt NSA agents who are waging a ruthless campaign to destroy Dean's life.

title: Enough Said
shortSummary: Massage therapist Julia Louis-Dreyfus begins a promising relationship with James Gandolfini, unaware of his connection to a client.
summary: A divorced massage therapist begins a promising relationship, unaware of his connection to a client in this comical look at the perils of mid-life dating. Julia Louis-Dreyfus stars as the witty masseuse who unexpectedly falls for a 'wonderful' James Gandolfini. Catherine Keener and Toni Collette co-star in this 'enjoyably meandering ensemble comedy' (Variety).

title: En El Ombligo del Cielo (In the Middle of Heaven)
shortSummary: A young female executive and a middle-aged janitor are trapped together on the roof of an office building over the weekend in Mexico City.
summary: Two people who would seem to have little in common--a young female executive and a middle-aged janitor--form an unlikely bond as they reflect on their lives while trapped together on the roof of an office building over the weekend in Mexico City.

title: Epic Movie
shortSummary: Four twenty-something orphans endure a hilarious series of adventures through popular films in this spoof.
summary: Four twenty-something orphans endure a hilarious series of adventures through popular films in this spoof. Tossed from the sets of their respective movies, the quartet is brought together at Willy Wonka's chocolate factory. Only this Willy is a bit more demented than expected prompting the group to head off for a journey where they send up one 'epic' movie after another.

title: Eragon
shortSummary: A farmboy discovers the egg of a dragon--and with it his destiny to resurrect an ancient line of dragon riders to fight an evil King.
summary: In a mythical world of swords & sorcery, a farmboy discovers the egg of a dragon--and with it his destiny to resurrect an ancient line of dragon riders. But the nefarious King who left the dragon species all but extinct has other plans for young Eragon. With help from a craggy old warrior, Eragon and his fire-breathing pet prepare to do battle against the King's army.

title: Everyone's Hero
shortSummary: A fired Yankee Stadium worker's son goes in search of Babe Ruth's stolen bat in this Depression-era animated tale.
summary: Yankee Irving can't hit a ball to save his life, but his luck only gets worse when his pop gets canned from working at the Stadium. Can young Yankee find Babe Ruth's stolen bat and save his dad's livelihood and reputation? Major League Baseball trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball Properties, Inc.

title: Exorcist The Beginning
shortSummary: This prequel to William Friedkin's 1973 classic 'The Exorcist' chronicles Fr. Merrin's first battle against demonic possession.
summary: This is where the demonic horror all began! This prequel to 'The Exorcist' chronicles Fr. Merrin's first battle against demonic possession. Set in 1949, Merrin (Stellan Skarsgard) is a fallen-away priest whose loss of faith prompts him to concentrate on archeology. Sent to Kenya to investigate an amazing find, Merrin finds himself up against the ultimate in evil.

title: Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close
shortSummary: A young boy coping with his dad's death on 9/11 embarks on a mission to discover what a mysterious key unlocks.
summary: The crushing impact of 9/11 is witnessed from the perspective of an 11-year-old boy struggling to cope with the loss of his father in the tragedy. Oskar Schell has been devastated since his dad died, but when he finds a mysterious key in his father's things, he embarks on a seemingly impossible mission to discover what it unlocks. "Engrossing and emotional" (Idaho Statesman).

title: Eyes Wide Shut
shortSummary: Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman star in Stanley Kubrick's drama about a doctor who finds himself on a strange sexual odyssey.
summary: See it for yourself and decide. Stanley Kubrick's final picture instantly became one of the most debated and controversial films ever made. Tom Cruise is Dr. Bill Harford, a respected Manhattan physician. Nicole Kidman is his sultry wife Alice. After Alice reveals a vivid erotic fantasy, Bill storms out, soon finding himself on a strange sexual odyssey.

title: Eye for an Eye
shortSummary: Grieving mother Sally Field sets out to get the psycho who killed her daughter and got away with it.
summary: Grieving mom Sally Field is out to get the psycho who killed her daughter. Since the law didn't punish him, she will! Possessed by her need for vengeance, she turns from victim to vigilante--with shattering consequences.

title: Fair Game
shortSummary: Miami cop William Baldwin and leggy lawyer Cindy Crawford try to stay one step ahead of a renegade ex-KGB agent who wants her dead.
summary: In this action thriller, Miami cop William Baldwin and leggy lawyer Cindy Crawford try to stay one step ahead of a renegade ex-KGB agent who has targeted her for death. Together, they get out of jams that would stump James Bond, dodging bad guys equipped with high-tech weaponry. The two even manage to make some fireworks of their own!

shortTitle: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
shortSummary: A hot-wired teen learns the ropes of street racing in Japan in this third pulse-pounding entry in the film series.
summary: The rides are hot and the women are hotter as the third pulse-pounding entry in this blockbuster street-racing series burns rubber in exotic Japan. Lucas Black stars as the hot-wired teen who finds proving his mettle on the curvy streets of Tokyo is tougher than expected when a young thug schools him in the art of 'drifting.' Can he learn the ropes in time for the rematch?

title: The Fault in Our Stars
shortSummary: A dying teenage girl unexpectedly falls for a fellow cancer survivor in this moving adaptation of the bestselling novel.
summary: Hazel Grace Lancaster is a beautiful, intelligent 16-year-old girl...and she's dying. From the bestselling novel comes this moving film about Hazel (Shailene Woodley) as her struggle with the notion of death is compromised by her romance with a spirited fellow cancer survivor (Ansel Elgort). 'A sweet, romantic film full of sudden warmth and humor' (Miami Herald).

title: Feardotcom
shortSummary: An S & M-styled website unlocks a doorway to torturous terrors for its unwitting visitors in this dark horror film. Stephen Dorff stars.
summary: Stephen Dorff stars as a detective investigating a series of mysterious deaths that spark fears of an Ebola outbreak. He teams up with a Department of Health researcher (Natascha McElhone), and together they follow the grisly clues to www.feardotcom.com, a bondage site that is so realistic, it's literally frightening its victims to death by bringing their nightmares to life.

title: Fellow Traveller
shortSummary: A screenwriter and a matinee film idol are caught up in the McCarthy-era blacklisting witch hunts in this drama.
summary: In the Golden Age of Hollywood, two men had it all: one was a top screenwriter, the other a film idol. But when the witch hunts of McCarthyism swept into Tinseltown, it drove one out of the country and the other to suicide. Ron Silver stars in this stylish drama of one man's determination to take a stand against injustice. Hart Bochner plays his tormented movie-star friend.

title: The Fever
shortSummary: A woman awakens in a war-torn country battling a raging fever and grappling with questions of wealth, guilt and revolution.
summary: Oscar(R)-winner Vanessa Redgrave (Best Supporting Actress for 1977's 'Julia') stars in this intimate tale. Adapted by 'HBO Films' from writer/actor Wallace Shawn's deeply personal stage play, the film focuses on a nameless woman (Redgrave) who awakens in a war-torn, third-world country battling a raging fever and grappling with questions of wealth, guilt and revolution.

title: Ffolkes
shortSummary: Sabotage expert Roger Moore runs into dangerous action on the North Sea when a terrorist threatens to blow up a major oil rig.
summary: Answering a distress call from the British government, sabotage expert Roger Moore runs into dangerous action on the North Sea. His target is a terrorist who is holding the future of England at bay while threatening to blow up a major oil rig.

title: Firehouse Dog
shortSummary: A coddled canine puts the spark back into a dispirited fire station in this family film.
summary: A coddled canine puts the spark back into a dispirited fire station in this family film. Famous dog-actor Rexxx lives in luxury...until a botched airplane stunt leaves the pup feared dead. Far from his home and fans, Rexxx waddles into a decaying firehouse where he uses his talents to save lives and light up the lifeless station.

title: A Fish Called Wanda
shortSummary: Buxom American beauty Jamie Lee Curtis gets involved in a London jewel heist in this acclaimed comedy.
summary: You'll fall hook, line and sinker for this 'zany, sexy, witty romp with a superb cast' ('Newsday'). Jamie Lee Curtis is Wanda, a buxom American beauty who gets involved in a London jewel heist. When the gang's leader is arrested, Wanda tries to find the hidden loot by seducing his uptight lawyer! Kevin Kline won a 1988 Best Supporting Actor Oscar(R) for his performance.

title: Flicka
shortSummary: An unruly teen takes the reins of an equally rebellious horse in this updated remake of the beloved horse tale.
summary: What starts as a lousy summer for teenager Katy McLaughlin soon turns inspiring. Home in Wyoming on her family's horse-breeding ranch, Katy faces a hard-working summer after her poor performance in boarding school. But when Katy encounters a rowdy filly that her father considers dangerous and beyond discipline, Katy believes she has what it takes to tame the horse.

title: The Fly
shortSummary: David Cronenberg's gruesome update of the '50s classic about a scientist who accidentally combines his molecules with those of a fly.
summary: Graphic sci-fi shocks contrast with tender romance in David Cronenberg's gruesome update of the '50s classic. Scientist Jeff Goldblum is transformed by love--literally and figuratively--when a scientific experiment combines his molecules with those of a fly. His transformation into an inhuman monster is both horrifying and touching: girlfriend Geena Davis still loves him.

title: For Your Consideration
shortSummary: A washed-up actress jumps into the spotlight when her performance in a dud movie garners Oscar(R) buzz in this Christopher Guest satire.
summary: The sacred cows of Hollywood are toppled in this ensemble comedy from the team behind 'Best in Show.' When the washed-up actress starring in the destined-to-be-forgotten 'Home for Purim' receives surprising Oscar(R) buzz, she and her co-stars rush into a scramble for recognition that exposes the absurdity of both the entertainment media and the machinery of indie filmmaking.

title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
shortSummary: Love-struck Englishman Hugh Grant pursues the heart of lovely American Andie MacDowell through the five events of the title.
summary: Love-struck Englishman Hugh Grant pursues the heart of lovely American Andie MacDowell through the five events of the title in this winning romantic comedy. A 1994 Oscar(R)-nominee for Best Picture and Best Original Screenplay. 'Elegant, festive and very, very funny' (The New York Times).

title: Free Ride
shortSummary: A single mom with two young daughters moves to Florida in the late 1970s, where she gets involved in a pot-smuggling operation.
summary: Writer-director Shana Betz's semi-autobiographical drama stars Anna Paquin (HBO's "True Blood") as a single mom with two young daughters who escapes an abusive relationship and moves to Florida in the late 1970s, where she gets involved in a pot-smuggling operation.

title: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel
shortSummary: Three social misfits are drawn into a wild time-travel adventure via the bathroom of their favorite local pub.
summary: Hanging at a local pub, Ray, Pete and Toby meet a lovely young woman who claims to be a time traveler from the future. As she spins her wild tale, the skeptical Pete stumbles into a time portal--in the pub's toilet--and sets off a wild adventure that results in a comedic crisis of mistaken identities, close calls, romance and anarchy--with the future of mankind at stake.

title: Funny Farm
shortSummary: City slicker Chevy Chase moves his family to the country with disastrous results in this riotous comedy.
summary: The birds are too noisy, the neighbors are weird, the lake has snakes and there's a corpse under the lawn. Other than that, country life is sheer bliss for funnyman Chevy Chase when he forsakes the rush of the city for the slow lane in this culture-clash comedy hit.

title: Game Change
shortSummary: The 2008 presidential campaign of John McCain and Sarah Palin is seen from the perspective of a beleaguered strategist.
summary: With John McCain trailing in the polls during the 2008 U.S. presidential election, strategist Steve Schmidt knew he needed a 'game changer' to turn the tide. With Sarah Palin, he thought he had found that person. This searing, behind-the-scenes look at McCain's ill-fated campaign follows the daring plan to add Palin to the ticket and the implosion that would soon follow.

shortTitle: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
title: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
shortSummary: The portly comic-strip feline finds himself living the high life in London thanks to a case of mistaken identity in this riotous sequel.
summary: Crossing the Atlantic with puppy pal Odie, the portly feline plans to hamper his owner's marriage proposal, but soon finds himself mistaken for a missing tabby with a noble inheritance. Garfield's living the high life in London while his counterpart Prince works the streets, but there's one big problem--the evildoer behind the kitty-napping now wants to get rid of Garfield!

title: The Gathering Storm
shortSummary: Albert Finney stars in this story of Winston Churchill's struggles to resurrect his political career and save his marriage prior to WWII.
summary: In his darkest hours as both a husband and a politician, Winston Churchill found the strength to wage a solitary battle against Nazi tyranny. Albert Finney and Vanessa Redgrave star as Winston and Clementine Churchill in this intimate story that chronicles the obstacles they faced in their marriage against the backdrop of the growing threat of a second World War.

title: Get On Up
shortSummary: Chadwick Boseman electrifies as the legendary 'Godfather of Soul,' James Brown, in this exhilarating bio-pic.
summary: He began life as a poor kid from rural South Carolina...but by the time he was done, he was only one thing: the 'Godfather of Soul.' Chadwick Boseman electrifies as the legendary James Brown in this exhilarating bio-pic that chronicles his rough upbringing, his rise to superstardom, and all of the larger-than-life mayhem and unforgettable music he produced along the way.

title: Gia
shortSummary: Angelina Jolie stars in the tragic story of Gia Carangi, the supermodel who dominated the international fashion scene of the late '70s.
summary: She was one of the most beautiful and envied women in the world...and one of the loneliest. Angelina Jolie stars in this drama based on the tragic true story of Gia Carangi, the supermodel who dominated the international fashion scene of the late '70s until her drug-fueled lifestyle and unhappiness caught up with her.

title: The Girl
shortSummary: Iconic director Alfred Hitchcock's obsessive relationship with actress Tippi Hedren is the focus of this HBO Films drama.
summary: He was the Master of Suspense, a director whose films thrilled, terrified and wowed. But to Tippi Hedren, the true terror of Alfred Hitchcock came from the director himself. Mirroring Hitchcock's own movies, this tale of obsession chronicles the director's grooming of Hedren into a star--and his growing obsession with her personally--as they filmed 'The Birds' and 'Marnie.'

title: Girl, Interrupted
shortSummary: Troubled teen Winona Ryder is committed to an institution where she meets an eclectic batch of characters.
summary: Susanna, a teenager growing up in the late 1960s, doesn't know where she belongs. She's too crazy for her parents' refinement, and she's too sane for Claymoore, the mental institution to which she is committed. Strangely, she starts to feel at home at Claymoore, whose disturbed inhabitants include a charismatic sociopath, a bulimic daddy's girl and a self-willed burn victim.

title: Godzilla
shortSummary: The King of the Monsters returns to battle a deadly pair of bug-like kaiju--and wreck major cities in the process--in this thrilling remake.
summary: The King of the Monsters returns to the screen to battle a deadly pair of bug-like kaiju--and wreck major cities in the process--in this thrilling remake. With military might proving fruitless against such massive creatures, it's up to Godzilla to stop the nasty duo before they can mate. It all comes down to an explosive showdown with San Francisco as the background.

shortTitle: Gold Diggers: Secret of Bear Mountain
title: Gold Diggers: The Secret of Bear Mountain
shortSummary: Two teenage girls set out on a quest to find gold buried in Bear Mountain in this 'delightful' ('The Washington Post') family film.
summary: Could gold be buried in Bear Mountain? Two teenage girls set out on a quest for the truth in this family film. City-raised Beth thought she would loathe her new country home, but when she meets the rugged Jody, she embarks on a riveting adventure. Convinced that treasure awaits, the new pals trade their troubles for an exciting trek into the depths of Bear Mountain.

title: Gone Girl
shortSummary: Ben Affleck is the prime suspect in his famous wife's disappearance in this twist-filled adaptation of the acclaimed bestseller.
summary: From Gillian Flynn's bestseller comes this 'expertly crafted' film starring Ben Affleck as magazine writer Nick Dunne whose wife Amy (Rosamund Pike) disappears. Famous for being 'Amazing Amy' of her parent's beloved children's books, Amy Dunne's disappearance sparks national attention and, as secrets are revealed, soon makes Nick the prime suspect in her disappearance.

title: Good Boy!
shortSummary: A young boy adopts a stray dog that turns out to be an emissary from outer space that was sent to Earth to prepare for a canine invasion!
summary: A lonely young boy adopts a stray dog that becomes his best friend, unaware that the pup is actually an emissary from outer space that was sent to Earth to prepare for a canine invasion!

title: The Good Lie
shortSummary: A feisty employment agency worker aids Sudanese War orphans when they come to the United States.
summary: This "touching, generous-hearted movie" (Hollywood Reporter) details the harrowing plight of Sudanese War orphans who survive tragedy and face new challenges when they come to the United States.

title: Good Night, and Good Luck
shortSummary: Docudrama chronicling CBS newscaster Edward R. Murrow's historic, on-air takedown of Commie-baiting Senator Joseph McCarthy in 1954.
summary: George Clooney directed, co-wrote and co-stars in this docudrama chronicling CBS newscaster Edward R. Murrow's historic, on-air takedown of Commie-baiting Senator Joseph McCarthy in 1954.

title: A Good Woman
shortSummary: In 1930s Italy, a notorious seductress sets her sights on a wealthy businessman, while his new bride is pursued by a rakish playboy.
summary: Oscar Wilde's classic comedy-of-manners "Lady Windermere's Fan" is updated from 1890s England to 1930s Italy, as a notorious seductress sets her sights on a wealthy businessman, while his new bride is pursued by a rakish playboy.

title: Gothika
shortSummary: Psychiatrist Halle Berry awakens to find herself in a terrifying predicament that leads her down a dark, evil path into the supernatural.
summary: Imagine awakening to discover yourself locked in a psychiatric ward with no memory of committing the most heinous crime: murdering your husband. For Dr. Miranda Grey, the nightmare is a reality...and it's just beginning. Halle Berry stars as Grey, a criminal psychologist whose terrifying predicament leads her down a dark, evil path into the supernatural.

title: Gravity
shortSummary: Sandra Bullock is riveting as an astronaut left adrift in space in the wake of a disaster in this Oscar(R)-winning epic.
summary: Winner of 7 Academy Awards, including Best Director (Alfonso Cuaron)! When debris from a destroyed satellite riddles the space shuttle, astronaut Sandra Bullock and space-walking partner George Clooney find themselves drifting alone in space...with their hopes for survival fading with every breath. A 'white-knuckle space odyssey' (Variety).

title: Grey Gardens
shortSummary: The lives of two eccentric, mutually dependent women play out in a decaying house known as Grey Gardens.
summary: They were once steeped in affluence, enjoying a luxurious lifestyle in East Hampton while they defied convention amidst the social royalty. Based on the women who inspired the Maysles brothers' 1975 documentary, this film tells the story of 'Big Edie' and 'Little Edie' Bouvier Beale, whose eccentric, mutually dependent lives played out in a decaying house known as Grey Gardens.

title: Hanging Up
shortSummary: The conflicts among three sisters and their crotchety drunk of a father unfold in this witty comedy-drama.
summary: In the busy lives of three sisters, their aging father is a burden that has not been shared equally. Eve has taken most of the responsibility, while the other two are too involved in their own lives to help the crotchety drunk. The conflicts among the girls unfold through a tangle of phone calls, family gatherings and flashbacks in this witty tale.

title: Hang 'em High
shortSummary: Clint Eastwood plays a vengeful cowboy out to kill the men who lynched him in this rugged 1968 western.
summary: Lynched and left for dead, an innocent cowboy lives--and goes after the men who hung him. Clint Eastwood plays the vengeful rider in this rugged 1968 western.

title: Happily N'Ever After
shortSummary: Cinderella's evil stepmother schemes to make sure there won't be any more happy endings in Fairy Tale Land.
summary: When the Wizard of Fairy Tale Land goes on vacation, Cinderella's evil stepmother schemes to make sure there won't be any more happy endings.

title: Happily N'Ever 2
shortSummary: Snow White is a spoiled teen who has to change her ways when she discovers that her father's fiancee is a real witch!
summary: Snow White is a spoiled teen who suddenly has to grow up and change her ways when she discovers that her father's fiancee is a real witch!

shortTitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
shortSummary: The fourth 'Harry Potter' film takes the young wizard into his most dangerous territory yet as he finally encounters evil Lord Voldemort.
summary: The fourth installment in the Harry Potter series takes the young wizard into his most dangerous territory yet as Lord Voldemort--the villain who killed Harry's parents--regains his powers. (C) 2005 Warner Bros. Harry Potter Publishing Rights (C) J.K. Rowling. HARRY POTTER, characters, names and related indicia are trademarks of and (C) Warner Bros. All rights reserved.

title: The Haunted Mansion
shortSummary: Eddie Murphy brings his family to a crumbling, spook-infested palace in this tale inspired by the Disney theme park ride.
summary: It's hair-raising hijinx for real-estate salesman Eddie Murphy and his family in this effects-filled horror-comedy inspired by the beloved Walt Disney theme park ride. Unable to pass on a possible listing, Murphy detours his family's vacation for a visit to the ultra-creepy Gracey Manor--a crumbling, spook-infested palace that comes replete with its own graveyard!

title: HBO Access 01: The Walk
shortSummary: A Mexican man and his son are faced with a major crisis of conscience as they try to cross the border illegally.
summary: A Mexican man and his son are faced with a major crisis of conscience as they try to cross the border illegally.

title: HBO Access 02: Emergency Contact
shortSummary: An inexperienced emergency-room nurse becomes the voice of reason to a woman having a breakdown.
summary: An inexperienced emergency-room nurse becomes the voice of reason to a woman having a breakdown.

title: HBO Access 03: Progress
shortSummary: The last black man on Earth stays in isolation until his existence is discovered by a white woman with a reason to find him.
summary: The last black man on Earth stays in isolation until his existence is discovered by a white woman with a reason to find him.

title: HBO Access 04: The Last Song
shortSummary: A Korean woman working at a karaoke bar bonds with a mysterious stranger who refuses to leave at closing time.
summary: A Korean woman working at a karaoke bar bonds with a mysterious stranger who refuses to leave at closing time.

title: Heaven Help Us
shortSummary: Mischievous teens raise havoc in a Brooklyn catholic high school circa 1965 in this 1985 comedy.
summary: Mischievous teens raise havoc in a Brooklyn catholic high school circa 1965 in this 1985 comedy. Andrew McCarthy stars as Michael Dunn, the new kid in school whose tragic past bonds him with soda-shop clerk Mary Stuart Masterson. Kevin Dillon co-stars as the crude, raucous prankster whose hijinks lands Dunn and their cohorts in hot water with the stuffy and brutal Brothers

title: Hell Baby
shortSummary: An expectant married couple call in the Vatican's elite exorcism team after discovering that their new house has a demonic curse.
summary: From the creators of Reno 911! comes this zany horror spoof. Rob Corddry and Leslie Bibb star as an expectant married couple who have to call in the Vatican's elite exorcism team after discovering that their new fixer-upper house comes complete with a demonic curse.

title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
shortSummary: The powerful story of the war-torn romance between literary giant Ernest Hemingway and trailblazing war correspondent Martha Gellhorn.
summary: It was a romance born out of war...and later torn apart by it. This powerful HBO Films drama recounts the relationship between literary giant Ernest Hemingway and trailblazing war correspondent Martha Gellhorn. Nicole Kidman and Clive Owen star as the two writers whose passionate romance played out against such epic backdrops as the Spanish Civil War and World War II.

title: Hidalgo
shortSummary: Viggo Mortensen stars as famed Wild West horseman Frank T. Hopkins, who enters a grueling race across 3,000 miles of the Arabian Desert.
summary: Saddle up for this "thrilling, epic adventure" (Access Hollywood) based on a true story. Viggo Mortensen stars as famed Wild West horseman Frank T. Hopkins, who, with his trusty mustang Hidalgo, enters a grueling race across 3,000 miles of the Arabian Desert in 1890, battling sandstorms, locusts and evil competitors.

title: A History of Violence
shortSummary: A small-town diner-owner's life is shattered by the arrival of shadowy figures who may be part of his past.
summary: This adaptation of the acclaimed graphic novel tells the story of Tom Stall (Viggo Mortensen), a quiet, respected diner owner who is forced to resort to violence after he is accosted by two mob goons who claim to know him. Tom is hailed as a hero, but it isn't long before more of the bad guys show up...and questions begin to arise about Tom's past.

shortTitle: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
shortSummary: Bilbo, Gandalf and a motley crew of dwarves continue their quest to battle the evil dragon Smaug in Part II of the 'Hobbit' trilogy.
summary: Bilbo, Gandalf and a motley crew of dwarves continue their quest to retake the dwarf kingdom of Erebor from the dragon Smaug in Part Two of the 'Hobbit' trilogy. Facing danger at every turn from orcs, giant spiders, and even wood elves, the surly bunch make their way to Smaug's lair where untold treasure awaits...if the fire-breathing beast doesn't burn them to a crisp first.

title: Hollow Man
shortSummary: A brilliant scientist succeeds in making himself invisible, but goes mad in the process.
summary: Scientist Sebastian Caine (Kevin Bacon) makes an incredible discovery--invisibility--in this update of 'The Invisible Man.' Fading from view, Sebastian achieves the impossible. But the thrill is short-lived when his co-workers are unable to make him visible. Stuck in the prison of his discovery, Sebastian begins to come unraveled, descending on a downward spiral into madness.

shortTitle: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
shortSummary: Macaulay Culkin returns as America's funniest kid in distress, this time on his own in the Big Bad Apple.
summary: Kevin's back! Macaulay Culkin returns as America's favorite kid in distress, and this time he's on his own in the Big Bad Apple. Armed with Dad's wallet and credit cards, Kevin's having the time of his life! But uh-oh! Those two inept burglars from back home show up to rob a kindly old toy-store owner of the money he was planning on donating to a children's hospital.

title: Home Alone 3
shortSummary: A precocious eight-year-old boy who is stuck at home with chicken pox teaches a group of bumbling burglars that crime doesn't pay.
summary: Alex Pruitt thought a day alone in his house recovering from chicken pox would be fairly relaxing. Boy, was he ever wrong! Three Stooges-style hilarity ensues when the precocious eight-year-old is forced to teach a group of bumbling burglars that crime doesn't pay. Starring Alex D. Linz and Haviland Morris. Directed by Raja Gosnell; written by John Hughes.

title: Hoot
shortSummary: Three kids create chaos to save endangered owls from a construction firm in this family film based on the award-winning novel.
summary: Three kids create covert chaos to save endangered owls in this family film based on the award-winning novel. Roy Eberhardt, the new kid in school, joins forces with tomboy Beatrice and a peculiar loner named Mullet Fingers. Together, they make it their mission to wreak havoc to prevent a construction-site supervisor from destroying the natural habitat of a flock of owls.

title: Horrible Bosses 2
shortSummary: The Horrible Boss avengers become bosses themselves--of their own entrepreneurial effort--in this raucous sequel to the hit comedy.
summary: The Horrible Boss avengers become bosses themselves--of their own entrepreneurial effort--in this raucous sequel. Jason Bateman, Charlie Day and Jason Sudeikis are back as office schlubs whose clueless effort to bring a new product to market--the Shower Buddy--leads them into business with a sleazy mail-order CEO. With Jennifer Aniston, Jamie Foxx, Chris Pine, Christoph Waltz.

title: Hot Shots!
shortSummary: Daring flyboys jet off to make the skies safe for democracy--and to shoot down lots of time-honored movie cliches--in this parody.
summary: Daring flyboys take to the wild blue yonder to make the skies safe for democracy--and to shoot down lots of time-honored movie cliches--in this parody. Charlie Sheen plays a Navy top gun once booted out of the service for insubordination but now back in the cockpit to lead his squadron on a secret mission--and to romance beautiful military psychiatrist Valeria Golino.

title: House of Saddam - Part I
shortSummary: Baghdad, 1979. Deputy President Saddam Hussein and his allies take control of Iraq after intimidating the President into resigning.
summary: Baghdad, 1979. Deputy President Saddam and his allies intimidate President Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr into resigning. Convening his first Ba'ath party congress, the new president exposes 'detractors,' who are forced to confess to an attempted coup and executed by party members in a test of loyalty. The personality of Saddam soon permeates Iraq.

title: House of Saddam - Part II
shortSummary: 1988. Baghdad is jubilant in victory after the war with Iran, but Kuwait's upsurge in oil output prompts Saddam's wrath.
summary: 1988. Though Iraq is on the brink of bankruptcy, Baghdad is jubilant in victory after the war with Iran. Uday celebrates in a nightclub by getting drunk and firing a gun into the crowd. As Kuwait's upsurge in oil output challenges Iraqi prosperity, a family lunch reveals fractures in Saddam's household. Later, Saddam leads his army into 'the mother of all battles.'

title: House of Saddam - Part III
shortSummary: May 1995. Iraq is crippled by UN sanctions for refusing to comply with weapons inspections.
summary: May 1995. Iraq is crippled by UN sanctions for refusing to comply with weapons inspections. When inspectors are finally admitted, a cat-and-mouse game begins. In charge of the subterfuge is Qusay, Saddam's new successor--a move that infuriates Hussein Kamal. Later, Hussein and his brother cross the border to take diplomatic asylum in Jordan.

title: House of Saddam - Part IV
shortSummary: March 2003. As U.S. forces seize control of Iraq, Saddam instructs most of his family to flee and prepares to hide himself.
summary: March 2003. As Bush declares "the day of liberation is near," Saddam instructs most of his family to flee to Syria; only Uday, Qusay and grandson Mustapha remain. As coalition forces flood Baghdad, Saddam remains holed up in a hut. Uday, Qusay and Mustapha hide in a relative's house, but the location leaks to U.S. officials. Later, Saddam senses the net closing in on him

title: Hulk
shortSummary: Marvel Comics' mean green superhero is brought to life by Oscar(R)-winning director Ang Lee in this thrilling and thoughtful origins story.
summary: Marvel Comics' mean green superhero is brought to life by Oscar(R)-winning director Ang Lee in this thrilling origins story. Eric Bana stars as Dr. Bruce Banner, a scientist who transforms into the rage-filled Hulk whenever he's under duress. Co-starring Jennifer Connelly as Banner's devoted partner and Sam Elliott as her cold-blooded General-father who wants the Hulk dead.

title: Hyde Park on Hudson
shortSummary: FDR's relationship with a mistress plays out against the backdrop of a Royal visit to the President's country estate. Bill Murray stars.
