summary: Franklin Delano Roosevelt's relationship with a younger mistress plays out against the backdrop of a Royal visit to the President's upstate New York country estate in this intriguing, witty tale. Bill Murray stars as FDR who must exert his renowned skills of diplomacy while dealing with the visiting King and Queen of England--as well as with his lovelorn cousin (Laura Linney).

title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
shortSummary: Manny the Mammoth, Diego the saber-toothed tiger, Sid the Sloth and Scrat the Squirrel face global warming in this animated sequel.
summary: Animated ice-age creatures Manny the Mammoth, Diego the saber-toothed tiger, Sid the Sloth and frustrated acorn-chaser Scrat the Squirrel face their biggest challenge yet: global warming. With their glacier habitat turning into a water world, the animals set a course towards potential salvation--an ark of sorts that lies at the other end of the valley.

title: Idiocracy
shortSummary: Two human guinea pigs awaken 500 years into the future to see a society dominated by idiots in this irreverent satire.
summary: Five hundred years in the future, the dumbing-down of America reaches epic levels. When 'average' Joe and Rita, human guinea pigs in an Army experiment, are frozen and accidentally abandoned, they thaw out in a world of fools. While smart people have hesitated to reproduce, the dumbest citizens have bred like crazy, resulting in a society in which Joe and Rita are geniuses!

title: Indictment: The McMartin Trial
shortSummary: A fact-based drama based on the longest and most expensive trial in American history that ended without a single conviction.
summary: The longest and most expensive trial in American history ended without a single conviction! The state of California spent seven years and 15 million dollars to prosecute the McMartin child-abuse case--a case that ended in deadlocked juries, a mistrial and outright acquittals. What's wrong with a criminal justice system that lets that happen? James Woods stars.

title: Inside Man
shortSummary: A cunning thief sets an elaborate bank robbery in motion that pits him against a determined detective in a cat-and-mouse game.
summary: A cunning thief sets an elaborate bank robbery in motion that quickly spirals out of control. Or is it going exactly as planned? Denzel Washington, Clive Owen and Jodie Foster star in this riveting thriller from director Spike Lee that the 'L.A. Times' described as 'deft and satisfying.'

title: Inspector Gadget
shortSummary: A nerdy security guard is transformed into a high-tech crime-fighting machine in order to defeat the nefarious Dr. Claw.
summary: Matthew Broderick stars as the greatest hero ever assembled in this family comedy based on the 1980s animated TV series. Broderick plays a nerdy security guard who is transformed into a high-tech crime-fighting machine in order to defeat the nefarious Dr. Claw.

title: Into the Storm
shortSummary: This follow-up to 'The Gathering Storm' follows Winston Churchill from 1940 to 1945 as he led his beleaguered nation through World War II.
summary: For five years, Winston Churchill played a huge role in thwarting the Nazis during World War II, his intrepid leadership inspiring millions. This powerful follow-up to HBO's Emmy(R)-winning 'The Gathering Storm' follows Churchill from 1940 to 1945 as he guided his beleaguered nation through the crucible of the war years--even as his marriage was encountering its own struggles.

title: Into the Storm
shortSummary: A small mid-western town is besieged by a devastating series of tornadoes in this thrilling disaster epic.
summary: A small mid-western town is besieged by a devastating series of tornadoes in this thrilling disaster epic that is jam-packed with first-rate special effects. As the residents of Silverton, including a vice principal and his sons, run for their lives, die-hard storm chasers and daredevils alike steer their way directly into the deadly path of these mega-twisters.

title: In Pursuit of Honor
shortSummary: Four U.S. Army men risk their careers--and their lives--to stand up for their beliefs in this rousing drama based on a true story.
summary: In 1935, General Douglas MacArthur saw the rising threat in Germany and determined to modernize the army. He ordered the last Cavalry unit to disband--and for the horses to be destroyed. But one group of soldiers were determined to save the animals, and took off across the plains on a mad dash for freedom--with an army tank unit in pursuit!

title: In the Land of Women
shortSummary: A young screenwriter gets emotionally involved with a mother and her older daughter in this drama.
summary: Trying to regain direction, Carter Webb, a wannabe screenwriter lured into writing porn films, leaves L.A. for the serenity of Michigan. His ailing grandmother lives there, but it's her neighbors with whom Carter becomes intrigued. Soon after he meets the neurotic Sarah and her oldest daughter, the beautiful Lucy, Carter becomes caught up in their quirky problematic lives.

title: In & Out
shortSummary: Kevin Kline plays a straight schoolteacher who is 'outed' on national television by a former student in this comedy.
summary: Kevin Kline stars as an impeccably neat midwestern schoolteacher who is 'outed' on national television by one of his former students. The problem is, he never knew he was 'in.' His staid life turns hilariously topsy-turvy as he attempts to convince the town, his fiancee and especially himself that he's not gay. 'An out-&-out masterpiece' ('New York Daily News').

title: Jarhead
shortSummary: War may be hell, but for a Marine sniper and his fellow grunts in the Gulf War, it is boredom that drives them to the brink of madness.
summary: War may be hell, but for a Marine sniper and his fellow grunts, it is boredom that drives them to the brink of madness in this compelling drama set during the 1991 Persian Gulf War. Jake Gyllenhaal stars as 'Swoff,' a third-generation enlisted man whose intense training can't prepare him or his mates for the oppressive heat and boredom that await them in the Middle East.

title: Jersey Boys
shortSummary: Clint Eastwood's winning adaptation of the hit Broadway musical that details the story of music legends Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons.
summary: From the Tony(R)-winning Broadway musical comes this winning film from director Clint Eastwood that chronicles the story of 1960s music legends Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons. Starting from their New Jersey beginnings walking a fine line between show biz and organized crime, the film details their stunning rise to fame on the back of Valli's one-of-a-kind voice.

title: Joe's Palace
shortSummary: An empty London mansion casts a spell over an innocent young boy in this thought-provoking psychological drama.
summary: Young Joe takes a job as concierge for enigmatic billionaire Elliot Graham. His assignment: record the visitors at Graham's abandoned mansion across the street. While Joe befriends a pair of illicit lovers who use the home for their trysts, a young woman hired by Graham exposes a stunning family secret--and it's up to Joe to prevent the revelation from destroying Graham.

title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A.
shortSummary: Kurt Russell infiltrates the deadly, lawless island of Los Angeles in this futuristic follow-up to 'Escape From New York.'
summary: Ever since the big earthquake of 1998, Los Angeles has been an island, populated by the dregs of American society. Into this dangerous, lawless world comes rebel-with-a-cause Snake Plissken (Kurt Russell). His mission: find the Peruvian terrorist who stole the deadly 'doomsday box'--along with the President's rebellious daughter.

title: John Tucker Must Die
shortSummary: Three high-school beauties plot to bring the cocky campus stud down after they discover they've all been dating him at the same time.
summary: Three high-school beauties plot to bring the cocky campus stud down after they discover they've all been dating him at the same time. Their secret weapon: the awkward new girl in school. Before you can say 'makeover,' pretty social misfit Kate is transformed and catching John's eye--setting him up for almost certain heartbreak!

title: John Wick
shortSummary: A legendary hit man comes out of retirement to go on a ruthless rampage of revenge against the sadistic punks who attacked him.
summary: A legendary hit man (Keanu Reeves) comes out of retirement to go on a ruthless rampage of revenge against the sadistic punks who attacked him.

title: Joyful Noise
shortSummary: Queen Latifah and Dolly Parton play dueling divas who clash over control of a small town choir that enters a national competition..
summary: Queen Latifah and Dolly Parton play dueling divas in this 'feel-good' (Entertainment Tonight) musical comedy. When their small Georgia town falls on hard times, the local choir tries to lift everyone's spirits by winning a national competition. But the group's harmony is threatened when its two leading ladies clash over whether to stay traditional or shake things up.

title: The Judge
shortSummary: Hotshot lawyer Robert Downey Jr. must confront his strained relationship with his father--a local judge--upon his return home.
summary: Hotshot lawyer Robert Downey Jr. must confront the past as well as the strained relationship he shares with his father--a revered local judge--when he returns home for the funeral of his mother. When 'Judge' (Robert Duvall) appears to be the driver in a fatal hit-and-run, his son must step in to defend him against a prosecutor with an agenda.

title: Jumpin' Jack Flash
shortSummary: Computer whiz Whoopi Goldberg gets tangled in a rescue mission involving a British secret agent codenamed after the Rolling Stones hit.
summary: Wild spy-jinks put Whoopi Goldberg on the comedy hot seat in this romp. Computer whiz Whoopi gets tangled in a rescue mission when 'Jumpin' Jack Flash,' a British agent, gets into hot water behind the Iron Curtain and taps into her computer to ask for help. The race and the chase are on as she confronts a treacherous British ambassador and a batch of giddy complications.

title: Just Friends
shortSummary: A handsome music exec relives the heights of his high-school humiliation when he heads home and runs into the girl who rejected him.
summary: When Chris Brander bolted from his New Jersey home for L.A., he was an overweight, lovelorn nerd whose life was an endless cycle of insults and humiliation. A decade later, Chris returns as a trim, handsome music exec. But some things never change...and Chris reverts to form when he runs into his secret adolescent crush.

title: J. Edgar
shortSummary: Leonardo DiCaprio stars as J. Edgar Hoover, who ruled the FBI with an iron-fist from the 1920s to the '70s.
summary: Leonardo DiCaprio stars as J. Edgar Hoover, who ruled the FBI with an iron-fist from the 1920s to the '70s, resorting to blackmail, smear campaigns and any other means he deemed necessary to protect the country he loved. Clint Eastwood directed this 'masterful' (Roger Ebert) portrait of a man who kept secret files on virtually every prominent figure of the 20th century.

title: Kingdom Come
shortSummary: A patriarch's funeral brings together a houseful of contentious relatives in this amusing ensemble comedy.
summary: A patriarch's funeral brings together a houseful of contentious relatives in this comedy. Widow Whoopi Goldberg wants to tell the truth about her mean husband--on his tombstone! His  older son (LL Cool J) wants to understand his father. His younger son only wants peace from his shrewish wife. And the minister wants a respite from his indigestion. Can this family come together?

title: Krush Groove
shortSummary: Jump into the New York City rap scene with this high-energy music hit featuring some of the hottest Top l0 talents of the 1980s.
summary: Jump into the New York City rap scene with this high-energy music hit featuring some of the hottest Top l0 talents of the 1980s. Pop stars Sheila E., Run-DMC, The Fat Boys and Kurtis Blow rock and rap away. Krush Groove is a hip young record company struggling for success--but will a rival firm and a tough loan shark squeeze them out?

title: The Lake House
shortSummary: Two people occupying the same house at two different points in time find themselves involved in a strange, supernatural love affair.
summary: Two people occupying the same house at different times find themselves involved in a supernatural love affair. Keanu Reeves is an architect living in a house built on Lake Michigan. The year is 2004. In 2006, a lovely doctor (Sandra Bullock) moves into the same house. Magically, they begin corresponding through a mailbox--but can their love bridge the gap in time?

title: The Laramie Project
shortSummary: A groundbreaking drama that recreates the efforts of a NYC theater troupe who traveled to the scene of a gay man's brutal murder.
summary: What happens to an American town when a terrible crime rips it apart and thrusts it into the national spotlight? That is the question that led a New York City theatre troupe to the town of Laramie, Wyoming, to seek out residents whose lives were changed after a gay college student named Matthew Shepard was brutally beaten, tied to a fence and left for dead off a rural road.

shortTitle: The Last of the Blonde Bombshells
title: The Last of the Blonde Bombshells
shortSummary: Judi Dench stars as a widow who tries to reassemble the all-girl swing band in which she played during WWII.
summary: The last time they played, the Blonde Bombshells brought down the house--while bombs rained down over London. More than 50 years later, two of the group's original members try to strike up the band again...and stir up some romance. This life-affirming comedy stars Judi Dench as a widow who tries to reassemble the all-girl swing band in which she played during World War II.

title: Las Analfabetas (The Illiterate)
shortSummary: The relationship between an illiterate, middle-aged woman and the young teacher helping her learn how to read.
summary: Adaptation of Pablo Paredes' play that charts the relationship between an illiterate, middle-aged woman and the young teacher helping her learn how to read.

title: The Late Shift
shortSummary: David Letterman and Jay Leno battle for Johnny Carson's vacant job in this compelling story of the late-night talk-show wars.
summary: In 1990, Johnny Carson announced he was retiring...and all hell broke loose. While NBC schemed, CBS dreamed, and the question on everyone's lips was 'Who will get Johnny's job?' Jay Leno thought he deserved it, David Letterman knew he had earned it, and everybody else wanted a piece of the action. Kathy Bates won a Golden Globe(R) for her performance.

title: La gran familia espanola (Family United)
shortSummary: Five brothers reunite for a wedding at the family estate on the day that Spain plays in the 2010 World Cup final in this comedy.
summary: Five brothers reunite for a wedding at the family estate on the day that Spain plays in the 2010 World Cup final in this comedy.

title: La mujer de mi hermano
shortSummary: Stuck in a stale marriage, an unfulfilled young woman begins a steamy affair with her  husband's younger brother.
summary: Stuck in a stale marriage, a beautiful, sexually unfulfilled young woman begins a steamy affair with her vain husband's free-spirited younger brother.

title: La Vida Inesperada (The Unexpected Life)
shortSummary: After 10 years trying to make it as an actor in New York City, a Spaniard rethinks his life when he is visited by his cousin from Spain.
summary: After 10 frustrating years trying to make it as an actor in New York City, a Spaniard rethinks his life when he is visited by his cousin from Spain, who is unsure about his upcoming nuptials.

title: Leave It to Beaver
shortSummary: Beaver Cleaver and his all-American family are back in this 1997 film adaptation of the classic TV series.
summary: Beaver Cleaver and his all-American family are back in this 1997 film adaptation of the classic TV series. Life in the Ohio suburb of Mayfield is idyllic for the Cleavers--dad Ward, mom June, big brother Wally and eight-year-old Theodore a.k.a. "The Beaver". While Beaver tries out for the football team as part of a scheme to get a new bike, Wally begins to discover young love.

title: Legally Blondes
shortSummary: The perky British cousins to Elle Woods bring a similarly smashing sense of style and attitude to an L.A. prep school.
summary: The perky British cousins to Elle Woods of the original 'Legally Blonde' bring a similarly smashing sense of style and attitude to an L.A. prep school in this third film in the series.

title: Legend
shortSummary: Tom Cruise is off on a grand scale quest to save a beautiful young maid from a satanic lord in this epic fable.
summary: Sumptuous sword-and-sorcery fantasy pits top draw Tom Cruise against a satanic lord in this epic fable. In a land of demons, elves and unicorns, Cruise is the heroic beau of beautiful Mia Sara. When the evil Lord of Darkness steals the young maid, Cruise is off on a grand scale quest for rescue and righteousness in this lavish adventure from Ridley Scott.

title: The Lego Movie
shortSummary: A plain Lego figure leads a screwball quest to save his city from its evil ruler in this blockbuster animated hit.
summary: 'Everything is Awesome' about this hilarious animated tale that was one of the biggest box office hits of 2014! Emmet (voice of Chris Pratt) is a plain old Lego figure who is content to build straight from the manuals...until he finds the 'Piece of Resistance.' Marked as a savior who will save the city from its evil ruler, Emmet leads a screwball team on the ultimate quest.

title: Let's Be Cops
shortSummary: Masquerading as cops leads to respect, female attention and eventually big trouble for two L.A. screwballs in this comedy.
summary: Masquerading as cops leads to respect, female attention and eventually big trouble for two L.A. screwballs in this comedy. Damon Wayans Jr. and Jake Johnson star as the pair whose innocent impersonation gets carried away--and lands them on the bad side of a Russian mobster and his gang. Rob Riggle, Nina Dobrev, James D'Arcy and Andy Garcia co-star.

title: Life Is Beautiful
shortSummary: Roberto Benigni shines as a screwball father who uses his unique comedic gifts to shield his son from Nazi horrors.
summary: Roberto Benigni shines as a screwball father and husband who uses his unique comedic gifts to shield his son from the horrors of a Nazi concentration camp. Winner of three Oscars(R), including Best Actor for Benigni.

title: The Life of David Gale
shortSummary: An anti-capital punishment advocate winds up on death row himself after being charged with murdering a fellow activist.
summary: A respected professor and passionate anti-capital punishment advocate winds up on death row himself after being charged with murdering a fellow activist. Kevin Spacey and Kate Winslet star this suspenseful thriller that will keep you guessing up to its shocking finale.

title: Life Support
shortSummary: An HIV-positive woman's work at an AIDS outreach group helps her atone for the past, but winning back her family proves more difficult.
summary: Oscar(R)-nominee Queen Latifah stars as an HIV-positive Brooklyn woman who channels her energy and regret over past drug addiction into working for an AIDS outreach group. Her passion for her job reveals her deep desire for atonement, but her stubbornness threatens to drive her family even further away leading her to learn a poignant lesson about loving...and letting go.

title: A Little Princess
shortSummary: A resourceful girl goes from riches to rags after her father is reported killed in WWI in this film based on the children's classic.
summary: In this 'delicate, imaginative, beautifully mounted' ('New York Daily News') family movie based on the timeless children's classic, a resourceful young girl goes from riches to rags after her father is reported killed in WWI. But her vivid imagination, storytelling talent and supportive friends sustain her faith and hope through all her troubles.

title: Lone Survivor
shortSummary: A four-man Navy SEAL team desperately tries to survive an attack by heavily armed Taliban insurgents in this fact-based drama.
summary: It was called Operation Red Wings: a directive to take out Taliban insurgents in a remote region of Afghanistan. When the four-man Navy SEALs recon team is compromised, the men find themselves under a relentless assault. Based on a real-life story, this 'scorching, often unbearably brutal' film spotlights the bravery, loyalty and sheer guts of some of America's finest soldiers.

title: Longford
shortSummary: 'HBO Films' drama about Frank Pakenham, the Earl of Longford, and his controversial friendship with notorious child-killer Myra Hindley.
summary: Frank Aungier Pakenham, the 7th Earl of Longford, was one of the most controversial public figures in modern British history, a crusader with a proclivity for championing lost causes. But it was his last cause--an unlikely friendship with reviled child-killer Myra Hindley--that would undermine his political career and, possibly, her 36-year attempt to win her freedom.

title: Long Time Dead
shortSummary: A party takes a diabolical turn when a game of Ouija unleashes an evil entity in this horror film.
summary: A party takes a diabolical turn when a game of Ouija unleashes an evil entity in this horror film. One by one, the young partygoers are dispatched in shocking ways as the demonic force makes its sinister presence known. 'It's fun, it's entertaining, and it's creepy' (Cinema Crazed).

title: Loser
shortSummary: College turns into a time of exploitation for two good-hearted young people struggling in New York City.
summary: Small-town scholarship student Paul (Jason Biggs) is bunking in a veterinary hospital after being kicked out by his obnoxious roommates...and sweet Dora (Mena Suvari) is the mistress of an arrogant English professor. When the aftermath of a wild party given by Paul's ex-roommates throws the two innocents together, Cupid proves that two losers can be winners in love.

title: Love and a .45
shortSummary: Two Texas lovebirds on the lam break for the border...with the law, their ex-partner and two murderous hoodlums in hot pursuit!
summary: Two Texas lovebirds on the lam break for the border...with the law, their ex-partner and two murderous hoodlums in hot pursuit! Watts and Star have been making their living by robbing convenience stores. But murder enters the picture when they hook up with a drug-crazed biker, and soon they find themselves running for their lives. Gil Bellows and Renee Zellweger star.

title: Lucky You
shortSummary: A gambling man tosses his chips into a big-time tournament while learning some important lessons in this drama.
summary: A gambling man tosses his chips into a big-time tournament while learning some important lessons in this 'entertaining movie' ('L.A. Times'). Huck Cheever (Eric Bana) is a young man of big wagers and little commitment in life. Playing the Las Vegas strip, Huck puts his poker skills to the test in the World Series of Poker--a tournament his shrewd father dominated twice.

title: Make Your Move
shortSummary: An ex-con falls for a beautiful Korean girl, despite the bitter rivalry between their brothers, who own rival underground dance clubs.
summary: Derek Hough plays an ex-con who falls for a beautiful Korean girl (BoA), despite the bitter rivalry between their brothers, who own rival underground dance clubs in Brooklyn

title: Malibu's Most Wanted
shortSummary: Jamie Kennedy plays a politician's son who sees himself as a street-smart gangsta in this outrageous comedy.
summary: Politician Bill Gluckman may be California's next governor. But the biggest threat to his campaign is his embarrassing son Brad, a.k.a. 'B-Rad' (Jamie Kennedy), a wannabe white rapper who rhymes about thug life on the streets...of Malibu. But a plan to shake up the youth backfires, leaving B-Rad to showcase his rap skills in the middle of South Central.

title: Mandrake Telefilm: Part 1
shortSummary: An intriguing case lands on Mandrake's desk. Just when he thinks he has it solved, some unexpected news changes the course of events.
summary: An intriguing case lands on Mandrake's desk. Just when he thinks he has it solved, some unexpected news changes the course of events.

title: Mandrake Telefilm: Part 2
shortSummary: After the murder of his client, Joao Paulo Birman, Mandrake investigates and uncovers new suspects--and Birman family secrets.
summary: After the murder of his client, Joao Paulo Birman, Mandrake investigates and uncovers new suspects--and Birman family secrets.

title: Man of the Year
shortSummary: Political jokester Robin Williams runs for president as a gag--and wins--in this political satire.
summary: Political jokester Robin Williams runs for president as a gag--and wins! Williams stars as Tom Dobbs, a popular TV talk show host whose shocking election to the White House results in a president who leads by way of brutal honesty and outrageous antics. But will the truth come out that Tom's win was the result of a glitch by a nefarious company's national voting system?

title: Maria y el arana (Maria and the Spiderman)
shortSummary: A 13-year-old girl living in a Buenos Aires shantytown falls for a 17-year-old boy who earns a living juggling in a Spiderman costume.
summary: A 13-year-old girl living in a Buenos Aires shantytown falls for a 17-year-old boy who earns a living juggling in a Spiderman costume.

title: The Marine
shortSummary: WWE wrestling star John Cena is a disgraced Marine who becomes a one-man army on a mission of revenge in this action-thriller.
summary: Wrestling star John Cena is a disgraced Marine who becomes a one-man army on a mission of revenge in this thriller. Rewarded for a heroic act in Iraq by being booted out of the military, John Triton is the last person you want to tick off. Enter a group of thugs who abduct Triton's wife to use her as leverage, launching the gung-ho Marine on a battle-filled chase to save her.

title: Mary and Martha
shortSummary: Two very different women forge a bond steeped in tragedy and African culture in this uplifting tale.
summary: Two women forge a unique bond steeped in tragedy in this uplifting, emotional film. Hilary Swank stars as an interior designer who takes her little boy on an extended trip to Africa; Brenda Blethyn is an English housewife whose own son heads to Africa as a volunteer. When malaria strikes, the lives of these two women are changed forever, uniting them on an epic journey.

title: Mateo
shortSummary: A Colombian teenager in danger of being lured into his uncle's criminal lifestyle finds hope for his future in a local theater group.
summary: A Colombian teenager in danger of being lured into his uncle's criminal lifestyle finds hope for his future in a local theater group in this drama. Starring Carlos Hernandez, Miriam 'Pesca' Gutierrez, Samuel Lazcano, Felipe Botero, Leldy Nino and Juan Orozco.

title: Material Girls
shortSummary: Sisters Hilary and Haylie Duff vow to save their late father's cosmetics company from being sold to the competition in this witty comedy.
summary: Sisters Hilary and Haylie Duff vow to save their late father's cosmetics company from being sold to the competition in this witty comedy. Co-starring Anjelica Huston, Lukas Haas and Maria Conchita Alonso as Inez with Brent Spiner.

title: May
shortSummary: An unhinged social misfit resorts to murderous measures in her effort to create the perfect friend in this psychological thriller.
summary: An unhinged social misfit resorts to murderous measures in her effort to create the perfect friend in this psychological thriller. Angela Bettis stars as the lonely, but malevolent outcast who is led down a bloody path that would make Dr. Frankenstein proud.

title: The Maze Runner
shortSummary: A teen with no memory of the outside world awakens in a gigantic maze guarded by deadly creatures, and plots a daring escape.
summary: A teen with no memory of the outside world awakens in a gigantic maze guarded by deadly creatures, and plots a daring escape with a group of other boys who are also trapped.

title: Meet the Parents
shortSummary: Robert De Niro and Ben Stiller star in this comedy about a guy whose first visit with his girlfriend's parents goes disastrously awry.
summary: For Greg Focker, the road to marrying his girlfriend Pam is about to take an extremely bumpy detour--through her parents' house. Robert De Niro and Ben Stiller are at their comical best in this classic that finds hapless male nurse Focker (Stiller) butting heads with Pam's ex-CIA dad (De Niro)--a 'human lie detector' who isn't sure any man is good enough for his little girl.

title: Meet Wally Sparks
shortSummary: Rodney Dangerfield goes to town as a vulgar, sex-crazed TV talk show host out to regain his ratings in this outrageously raunchy comedy.
summary: Laugh? You'll split your sides watching Rodney Dangerfield go to town in this outrageously raunchy comedy. As a vulgar, sex-crazed TV talk show host out to regain his ratings, 'Dangerfield is an absolute scream' ('New York Post'). It's a one-man, non-stop jokefest of baggy-pants gags, dopey slapstick and bug-eyed schtick.

title: The Mexican
shortSummary: Brad Pitt and Julia Roberts team up in this comedy about a petty criminal who is sent to Mexico to recover a valuable antique pistol.
summary: A moronic mob bagman, his noisy girlfriend, a closeted gay hit man and a valuable antique pistol all add up to big laughs and wild adventure in this road film that pairs megastars Brad Pitt and Julia Roberts for the first time. Pitt stars as Jerry, a low-level criminal who is sent to Mexico to recover a supposedly cursed gun--to his demanding girlfriend's chagrin.

title: Me Myself I
shortSummary: A single magazine journalist gets a magical chance to see what her life would have been like had she married her true love.
summary: Pamela is a single journalist living in Sydney whose loneliness has led her to the brink of suicide. Suddenly, she gets a magical chance to see what her life would have been had she married her true love 13 years ago. The only trouble is, now she actually has to live this life, complete with a bored husband, a pubescent daughter and a toddler in need of toilet training!

title: Miami Vice
shortSummary: Cops Crockett and Tubbs go undercover in the hunt for a drug kingpin in this stylish, full-throttle adaptation of the hit '80s TV series.
summary: Cops Crockett and Tubbs go undercover in the hunt for a drug kingpin in this stylish, full-throttle adaptation of the '80s TV series. Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as the Miami-based duo who work by their own rules. Following a botched raid, the resourceful pair use the cover of powerboat-racing drug runners to infiltrate a massive drug operation.

title: Mike Tyson: Undisputed Truth
shortSummary: Former heavyweight champion Mike Tyson and legendary filmmaker Spike Lee bring Tyson's one-man hit stage show to HBO in this special.
summary: Former heavyweight champion Mike Tyson and legendary filmmaker Spike Lee bring Tyson's one-man hit stage show to HBO in this exclusive HBO Films presentation. Enjoy a front-row seat as 'Iron Mike' opens up about his troubled youth, landmark boxing career, key influences, controversies, prison, loss, and most recently, his rehabilitation and redemption.

shortTitle: A Million Ways to Die in the West
title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
shortSummary: Seth MacFarlane is the most cowardly sheep farmer this side of the Rio Grande in this comical Old West send-up.
summary: Seth MacFarlane is the most cowardly sheep farmer this side of the Rio Grande in this Old West spoof. When avoiding a showdown gets him dumped, McFarlane vows to win back his girl by challenging her new lover to a draw...if he can learn to shoot first. Enter Charlize Theron as the tough-as-nails wife of a dirty gunslinger who teaches him a few things about handling his pistol.

title: Miss Evers' Boys
shortSummary: Emmy(R)-winning story of a 1930s experiment in which the U.S. government withheld treatment from African American syphilis patients.
summary: Winner of the 1997 Emmy(R) for Best TV Movie! In the 1930s, U.S. government doctors began a controversial experiment. They withheld treatment from a group of African-American men infected with syphilis in order to study the fatal course of the disease...and they didn't tell the men what they were doing. Alfre Woodard plays a dedicated nurse caught in the web of official lies.

shortTitle: Mom and Dad Save the World
title: Mom and Dad Save the World
shortSummary: A California couple are kidnapped by a lovestruck intergalactic despot in this riotous interstellar comedy.
summary: In the mood for total silliness on a planet of idiots? Then you couldn't do better than this comedy about a California couple kidnapped by intergalactic despot Jon Lovitz. He's fallen in love with Teri Garr, and unless she marries him, he'll destroy Earth!

shortTitle: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
title: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
shortSummary: The British comedy troupe explore the cycle of life, from birth to death, in their own twisted, offensive and hilarious style.
summary: Yearning for cosmic truths about sex, birth and death? Oh, lighten up, and let the wacko British troupe give you their outrageous version of what it's all about! A skit-packed comedy that skewers everything from religion to marriage to war, and much more.

title: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
shortSummary: Heroic warriors have just six days to defeat invaders from another dimension in an ancient tournament to save the Earth from extinction.
summary: This second installment of martial arts mayhem and fantasy based on the popular videogame picks up where the first film left off. The heroic warriors who defeated the evil Outworlders now have just six days to defeat even more invaders from another dimension in an ancient tournament to save the Earth from extinction.

title: Moulin Rouge!
shortSummary: The spectacular musical with Nicole Kidman as the star attraction in a Paris nightclub and Ewan McGregor as the man who falls for her.
summary: What happens when 19th-century Paris collides with 20th-century pop music? This Best Picture Oscar(R)-nominee stars Nicole Kidman as Satine, a doomed courtesan who is the featured attraction at the decadent Moulin Rouge--reimagined as a pulsating nightclub. Ewan McGregor plays Christian, a naive young writer who meets Satine by chance and falls utterly in love.

title: Mr. Nice Guy
shortSummary: Experience Jackie Chan at his breathtaking best in this action-comedy that pits him against a drug cartel.
summary: Experience Jackie Chan at his breathtaking best in this action-comedy that finds the agile superstar performing one incredible stunt after another. This time, he takes on a drug cartel that will do anything to recover an incriminating videotape. Before you can say 'chop socky', Chan puts dozens of bad guys on ice while saving a pretty reporter in the process.

title: Muhammad Ali's Greatest Fight
shortSummary: Nine Supreme Court justices spar over the legitimacy of Muhammad Ali's conscientious-objector appeal during the Vietnam War.
summary: He was one of boxing's all-time greats, but Muhammad Ali's biggest challenge took place far from the ring--in the United States Supreme Court, where the justices debated the outcome of his 1971 conscientious-objector appeal during the Vietnam War. Christopher Plummer, Frank Langella and Benjamin Walker star in this riveting HBO Films drama.

title: Mulholland Dr.
shortSummary: David Lynch's surrealistic film noir that follows three diverse storylines in the dark underbelly of Los Angeles.
summary: 'Four stars' (Roger Ebert). From the film genius behind 'Twin Peaks' and 'Blue Velvet' comes this harrowing trip into a dark and bizarre underbelly of Los Angeles. Justin Theroux, Naomi Watts and Laura Elena Harring star in this surrealistic film noir that follows three diverse storylines. The result is a wild, one-of-a-kind head-trip as only David Lynch can create.

title: Mystery Men
shortSummary: It's up to a bunch of bumbling superhero back-ups to stop an evil villain and save their futuristic town in this riotous comedy.
summary: It's up to a bunch of bumbling superhero back-ups--The Blue Raja, The Shoveler, The Sphinx, Mr. Furious, Invisible Boy, The Spleen and The Bowler--to recapture an evil villain and save their futuristic town in this riotous comedy.

title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
shortSummary: Nia Vardalos stars as a girl who creates a stir within her traditional Greek family by falling for a guy with one flaw--he's not Greek!
summary: Nia Vardalos stars as a single girl who creates a major stir within her traditional Greek family by falling for a guy who has one fatal flaw--he's not Greek! John Corbett plays the handsome gentleman who gets swept up in a big Greek love story in this riotous 2002 Best Original Screenplay Oscar(R) nominee that has become one of the most successful independent films ever made.

title: My Favorite Martian
shortSummary: A TV newsman (Jeff Daniels) discovers an alien from Mars that poses as his uncle.
summary: A TV newsman (Jeff Daniels) discovers an alien from Mars that poses as his uncle, and schemes to exploit the Martian, with snoopy government agents hot on their trail.

title: My Zinc Bed
shortSummary: Alcohol addiction and obsession form the core of this searing adaptation of renowned writer David Hare's play.
summary: Alcohol addiction and obsession form the core of this searing adaptation of renowned writer David Hare's play. The three-character piece follows a poet and recovering alcoholic named Paul, the billionaire businessman who befriends and employs him, and the tycoon's alcoholic wife who has chosen her own road to recovery that doesn't involve AA meetings.

title: Neighbors
shortSummary: Seth Rogen and his wife go to war against their new neighbors: a frat house run by party-hearty Zac Efron.
summary: It's a hilarious case of 'there goes the neighborhood' for a young couple when the wildest fraternity this side of 'Animal House' move in next door. Seth Rogen stars as the young dad whose battle of pranks against party-hearty Delta Psi president Zac Efron and his brothers turns into an epic game of one-upmanship. Rose Byrne, Christopher Mintz-Plasse and Dave Franco co-star.

title: Never Let Me Go
shortSummary: A love triangle develops among three human lab specimens who exist to serve as organ donors in a dark dystopian society.
summary: Based on Kazuo Ishiguro's novel, this film takes a hard look at a society set against an impeccable backdrop. A love triangle between three human lab specimens as they come into adulthood is played with a stunning simplicity by Kathy, Ruth and Tommy--as is their dark purpose in the elusive Hailsham School. A stunning, devastating glimpse into a dystopian society.

title: Nightingale
shortSummary: David Oyelowo delivers a powerhouse performance as a troubled war veteran who comes unraveled in his isolation.
summary: David Oyelowo delivers a powerhouse performance as a troubled war veteran who comes unraveled. A compassionate depiction of isolation in the midst of a world ruled by social media, the film follows Oyelowo as Peter--the sole character in the film--who shares an ongoing monologue with himself via his laptop's video recorder...after admitting he has snapped and killed his mother.

title: Night at the Museum
shortSummary: History comes to comical life at a famed museum during the wee hours of the night--much to hapless security guard Ben Stiller's chagrin.
summary: History comes to life at a famed museum at night--much to a hapless guard's chagrin. Larry Daley (Ben Stiller) takes the night watchman job at New York's American Museum of Natural History. But what his predecessors fail to tell him is that everything in the place--including Teddy Roosevelt, Attila the Hun and a massive T-Rex skeleton--comes alive once the doors are locked!

title: Norbit
shortSummary: A shy, sweet guy stands up to his pushy wife and her beefy brothers when his childhood love reappears in this outrageous comedy.
summary: Shy, sweet Norbit was a young orphan with little backbone when the robust Rasputia first stood up for him. Since then, Rasputia has called all the shots in Norbit's life--including their marriage and his employment with Rasputia's beefy brothers. But when Norbit's childhood love Kate comes back into the picture, she might just be someone worth standing up to the heavyweights!

title: The Normal Heart
shortSummary: The early days of the HIV-AIDS crisis in 1980s New York City is the focus of this searing HBO Films drama.
summary: The early days of the HIV-AIDS crisis in 1980s New York City is the focus of this searing HBO Films drama. Adapted from Larry Kramer's Tony(R)-winning play, the film provides an unflinching look at the nation's sexual politics as gay activists and their allies in the medical community fight to expose the truth about the burgeoning epidemic to a city and nation in denial.

title: A Number
shortSummary: In a world where human cloning is a reality, two genetically identical brothers confront their father in separate, chilling encounters.
summary: In a world where human cloning has become a reality, two genetically identical brothers confront their father as they search for explanations into their past. Tom Wilkinson and Rhys Ifans star in this haunting drama in which the two young men discover they have genetic doubles...and want answers from their father. But will the disturbing truth be more than they can handle?

title: Nuts
shortSummary: Barbra Streisand plays a high-priced call girl who refuses to cop a plea of insanity after murdering one of her clients.
summary: In one of her most challenging roles, Barbra Streisand plays a high-priced call girl who murders one of her clients. Though her parents try to convince her to cop a plea of insanity, she refuses the easy way out. Lawyer Richard Dreyfuss must convince the court of her competence, yet win her freedom.

title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
shortSummary: Portly scientist Eddie Murphy stands on the brink of love and success...if his skinny alter-ego doesn't get the best of him first!
summary: Portly scientist Eddie Murphy has a beautiful fiancee and a new youth serum that could make him rich...if his skinny alter-ego Buddy Love doesn't get the best of him first! Janet Jackson co-stars as his brilliant scientist girlfriend who may be his only hope of eliminating the ever-troublesome (but hilarious) Buddy. Larry Miller and John Ales co-star in this sequel.

title: An Officer and a Gentleman
shortSummary: A man in basic training engages in a battle of wills with the Navy's toughest drill sergeant while fighting his feelings for a local girl.
summary: Zack Mayo wants to make it through basic training. He wants desperately to become an officer and a gentleman. But two things get in the way. He falls in love with spunky Paula and he comes up against the Navy's toughest drill sergeant. A good old-fashioned Hollywood love story that became an enormous box-office hit!

title: The Omen
shortSummary: An American diplomat and his wife fear that their child may be the antichrist in this chilling, apocalyptic remake of the horror classic.
summary: An American diplomat and his wife fear that their child may be the antichrist in this chilling remake. Julia Stiles and Liev Schreiber star as the couple who refuse to believe the warnings that their son Damien may be the evil epicenter of an impending Armageddon. But as the signs of doom leave little doubt about the truth, can they do what's necessary to stop it?

title: One Fine Day
shortSummary: New Yorkers Michelle Pfeiffer and George Clooney meet, fight and fall in love--all in one day--in this breezy romantic comedy.
summary: Two New Yorkers meet, fight and fall in love--all in one day--in this breezy romantic comedy. Michelle Pfeiffer's a workaholic architect with a 5-year-old son. George Clooney's an easygoing newspaper columnist with a young daughter. When circumstances throw them together for a day of child care and career crises, it's hate at first sight...right up until the final clinch!

title: Original Sin
shortSummary: A Cuban coffee merchant's supposedly plain mail-order bride turns out to be a stunning--and duplicitous--seducttress.
summary: Antonio Banderas and Angelina Jolie burn up the screen in this steamy erotic thriller. Banderas is a wealthy Cuban coffee merchant at the turn of the 20th century whose supposedly plain mail-order bride turns out to be the stunning--and duplicitous--Jolie.

title: The Other Woman
shortSummary: Cameron Diaz. Leslie Mann and Kate Upton begin a campaign of revenge against the man who has been cheating on them.
summary: Carly, Kate and Amber all have one thing in common: Kate's cheating husband Mark! Cameron Diaz, Leslie Mann and Kate Upton star as the trio of jilted and very angry females who team up to exact revenge on the philandering cad (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) using any means necessary--including laxatives, hair remover and even estrogen! Don Johnson and Taylor Kinney co-star.

title: Out of Time
shortSummary: Small-town sheriff Denzel Washington is framed for murder and more after he uses confiscated drug money to help a cancer-stricken lover.
summary: Small-town sheriff Denzel Washington is framed for murder and more after he uses confiscated drug money to help a cancer-stricken lover. Eva Mendes, Sanaa Lathan and Dean Cain co-star in this hot-blooded thriller.

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
shortSummary: Three escaped convicts in 1930s Mississippi embark on an epic odyssey as they try to retrieve buried loot.
summary: The Coen brothers' quirky blend of comedy, crime and music centers on three escaped convicts in 1930s Mississippi who embark on an epic odyssey as they try to retrieve buried loot.

title: Pancho, el perro millonario (Millionaire Dog)
shortSummary: After winning the lottery, a pampered pooch becomes the target of kidnappers.
summary: After winning the lottery, a pampered pooch discovers that being rich isn't all it's cracked up to be when he becomes the target of kidnappers and unscrupulous businessmen.

title: Path to War
shortSummary: John Frankenheimer's powerful look at how President Lyndon Johnson became the symbol for the most unpopular war in U.S. history.
summary: From director John Frankenheimer ('The Manchurian Candidate') comes this powerful drama of soaring ambition and shattered dreams that takes a provocative insider's look at the way our country goes to war--as seen from inside the LBJ White House leading up to and during Vietnam. Michael Gambon stars as the former president.

title: Pay It Forward
shortSummary: Kevin Spacey and Helen Hunt star in this drama of a boy's ambitious plan to inspire random acts of kindness.
summary: Inspired by a school assignment, seventh-grader Trevor McKinney (Haley Joel Osment) comes up with a plan in which a person performs a random act of kindness. In return, the recipient must 'pay forward' good acts for three other people. While young Trevor's idea strikes a chord and begins to form into a movement, the boy finds himself trying to perform his own good act at home.

title: PCU
shortSummary: Frathouse slackers prepare to defend their house against political correctness--and their nasty school president--in this raucous comedy.
summary: Everyone at Port Chester University is politically correct--except for Droz and his fellow slackers at the Pit, the school's grungiest residence. They don't care who they offend! But a snotty preppy is in cahoots with the college's president to take over the house. Unless Droz can come up with $7,000, the Pit is history!

title: Pelo malo (Bad Hair)
shortSummary: The relationship between a precocious 9-year-old boy and his young, widowed mother is examined.
summary: This "artful, wrenching fable" (Boston Globe) examines on the relationship between a precocious 9-year-old boy and his young, widowed mother, who fears that her son may be showing early signs of homosexuality.

title: The Pentagon Wars
shortSummary: An honest Air Force officer tries to expose a case of government spending gone mad in this satirical comedy.
summary: Truth is stranger than fiction in this satiric comedy about an honest Air Force officer's attempt to expose a case of government spending gone mad! How could the government spend 17 years and $14 billion developing a simple troop carrier? Colonel Cary Elwes is determined to find out...and Pentagon general Kelsey Grammer is just as determined to stop him!

title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
shortSummary: Percy Jackson, the son of Poseidon, returns to find the legendary Golden Fleece in this epic adventure sequel.
summary: Percy Jackson returns to find the legendary Golden Fleece in this epic sequel. Joined by his friends and a cyclops half-brother, the son of Poseidon must find the Fleece before the devious lightning thief Luke...who plans to use it to destroy Olympus by resurrecting the ultra-evil Kronos. 'A fetching mix of whizz-bang CGI and full-blooded classical storytelling' (NPR.org)

title: The Phantom
shortSummary: The mysterious, purple-suited comic-book hero emerges to stop an evil industrialist from launching his plans for world domination.
summary: When an evil industrialist launches his plans for world domination, only one man stands in his way: The Phantom! Emerging from his lair on the remote jungle island of Bengalla, the mysterious, purple-suited comic-book hero must stop wealthy Xander Drax from bringing together the three fabled Skulls of Touganda, an act which will give him unimaginable power!

title: The Phantom of the Opera
shortSummary: Stirring adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber's Broadway smash about a disfigured stranger who haunts a Paris opera house.
summary: The music of the night is brought to vibrant life in this stirring adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber's Broadway hit. In 19th-century Paris, pretty chorus girl Christine Daae is secretly trained to sing by a masked man who haunts the opera house. Christine soon lands a lead role, but her romance with a childhood friend sends the scarred, lovelorn phantom into a deadly rage.

title: Phil Spector
shortSummary: Al Pacino and Helen Mirren star in this riveting HBO Films drama that follows the murder trial of legendary music producer Phil Spector.
summary: The client-attorney relationship between legendary music producer Phil Spector and defense lawyer Linda Kenney Baden--who represented Spector during his first murder trial--is explored in this HBO Films drama written and directed by David Mamet. Oscar(R) winners Al Pacino and Helen Mirren star in this work of fiction that recounts Spector's first trial in Lana Clarkson's death.

title: Picture This
shortSummary: Unpopular high-school girl Ashley Tisdale fights a technological war with a mean girl for the heart of the prom king.
summary: Unpopular high-school girl Ashley Tisdale gets the social boost she's been dreaming of--a state-of-the-art video phone--in this romantic comedy. But now her strict dad (Kevin Pollak) can track her every move as she competes with a mean school vixen for the heart of the dreamy prom king.

title: Pinochet's Last Stand
shortSummary: The fascinating story of former Chilean dictator Augusto Pinochet's surprise arrest for crimes against humanity while in London in 1998.
summary: In 1973, General Augusto Pinochet overtook Chile in a violent coup. During his 17-year rule, he suppressed all opposition, and gained a reputation as one of the world's most oppressive dictators. This HBO Films movie based on real-life events tells the fascinating story of Pinochet's surprise arrest for crimes against humanity while in London for back surgery in 1998.

title: Platoon
shortSummary: Oliver Stone's Oscar(R)-winning Vietnam drama with Charlie Sheen as a recruit who gets more than he bargained for on the battlefield.
summary: This searing, powerful drama of American soldiers in Vietnam won four 1986 Oscars(R), including Best Picture. Charlie Sheen plays a young, idealistic recruit who wants to test himself on the battlefield--and gets much more than he bargained for. Tom Berenger and Willem Dafoe were both Oscar(R)-nominated for Best Supporting Actor for their roles as very different sergeants.

title: Pleasantville
shortSummary: A teen from the 1990s is magically transported into the innocent black-and-white world of his favorite 1950s family sitcom.
summary: A teen from the 1990s is magically transported into the innocent black-and-white world of his favorite 1950s family sitcom, along with his sister, but discovers that things aren't quite as wholesome and happy as he had thought.

title: Poison Ivy: The New Seduction
shortSummary: An illicit affair between a businessman and his insatiable maid leads to the woman's undoing...and later revenge.
summary: Betrayal and revenge ignite this hotbed of steaming suspense and volatile sex. An illicit affair between a businessman and his insatiable maid leads to the woman's undoing. But she gets her revenge years later when her unscrupulous daughter arrives on the scene. A riveting brew aboil with deadly deceit and poisonous seduction.

title: Por Las Plumas (All About the Feathers)
shortSummary: A lonely security guard finds more than he expected when he buys a rooster in order to get into the cockfighting game.
summary: A lonely security guard in a sleepy Costa Rican town buys a rooster in order to get into the cockfighting game, but gets more than he expected as an odd friendship blooms between the pair.

title: Poseidon
shortSummary: A massive rogue wave turns a luxury cruise ship upside-down in this thrilling remake of the disaster classic 'The Poseidon Adventure.'
summary: A massive rogue wave turns a luxury cruise ship upside-down in this thrilling remake of the 1972 disaster classic 'The Poseidon Adventure.' With the prone vessel rapidly taking on water, a plucky group of survivors face a frightening series of dangers while attempting to find a way out. Can they escape before the doomed liner sinks to her watery grave?

title: Primo
shortSummary: The atrocities of the Third Reich are witnessed through the vivid, first-person recollections of an Auschwitz survivor.
summary: The atrocities of the Third Reich are witnessed through the vivid, first-person recollections of an Auschwitz survivor. Adapted by Antony Sher from the memoir of Holocaust survivor Primo Levi and featuring Sher in the starring role, the film reveals Primo's gripping story of his capture and the scary subsequent tenure at the notorious Nazi concentration camp.

title: Private School
shortSummary: Phoebe Cates is a gorgeous 'good' girl who's in danger of losing her boyfriend to the school siren.
summary: Cherryvale Academy may be private, but the girls’ shower room certainly isn’t in this lusty teen romp. Phoebe Cates ('Fast Times at Ridgemont High') is a gorgeous 'good' girl who’s in danger of losing her boyfriend to the school siren. Meanwhile, the boys from Freemount Academy are in a frenzy of hormonal hijinks. Sylvia Kristel plays a dizzy sex education teacher.

title: The Producers: The Movie Musical
shortSummary: Mel Brooks's classic roars to hilarious new life in this musical comedy with Nathan Lane and Matthew Broderick.
summary: Mel Brooks's comedy roars to new life in this musical. Nathan Lane and Matthew Broderick--reprising their roles from the 2001 Broadway hit--play producer Max Bialystock and nerdy accountant Leo Bloom, who scheme to bilk their investors by producing a musical so awful that it will only last one night. The result: 'Springtime for Hitler.' But there's no accounting for taste!

title: The Public Eye
shortSummary: Joe Pesci stars as a crime photographer in 1940s New York City who becomes captivated by a sultry club owner.
summary: Joe Pesci delivers a standout performance in this noir-ish tale of a crime photographer in 1940s New York City who becomes captivated by a sultry club owner. 'The Great Bernzini' is a shutterbug with a knack for capturing haunting images and a personal rule of not getting involved with his subjects--until he meets the troubled, but gorgeous Kay Levitz (Barbara Hershey).

title: Pu-239
shortSummary: A Russian nuclear-plant worker facing certain death from radiation exposure steals plutonium to sell in order to provide for his family.
summary: For a Russian nuclear-plant worker facing certain death after being exposed to a lethal dose of radiation, his wife and son's future is worth stealing for--even if it's the most dangerous substance on earth. Paddy Considine stars in this gripping thriller as  the ailing man who steals weapons-grade plutonium--and heads for Moscow to attempt to sell it on the black market.

title: Queen of the Damned
shortSummary: The vampire Lestat reawakens as a blood-drinking rock star in this adaptation of the Anne Rice novel.
summary: The vampire Lestat reawakens as a blood-drinking rock star in this adaptation of the third volume in Anne Rice's 'Vampire Chronicles.' Out of hibernation, Lestat plans a concert to bring prominence to the vampire ranks--much to their chagrin. But far more dangerously, he has awakened Queen Akasha, a vampire of royal descent whose powers go beyond anything Lestat has ever seen!

title: Quien Mato a Bambi? (Who Killed Bambi?)
shortSummary: Complications crazily mount when the debt-ridden owner of a pizzeria tries to kidnap a businessman, but accidentally abducts the wrong man.
summary: Complications crazily mount when the debt-ridden owner of a pizzeria tries to kidnap a businessman, but accidentally abducts the wrong man.

title: Ramona
shortSummary: An octogenarian announces she's ready to die, but changes her mind while her family is making the preparations.
summary: Prize-winning short film about an octogenarian who announces she's ready to die, but changes her mind while her family is making the preparations.

title: Rapid Fire
shortSummary: A pacifist college student is unwillingly drawn into a violent Chicago drug war between the Mafia and Asian gangs.
summary: Brandon Lee is a pacifist college student/martial-arts expert unwillingly drawn into a violent Chicago drug war between the Mafia and Asian gangs. Powers Boothe plays the tough cop who unleashes him on the unsuspecting bad guys.

title: Recount
shortSummary: Kevin Spacey stars in this gripping film that explores the human drama surrounding the controversial 2000 presidential election.
summary: In 2000, the presidential election boiled down to a few precious votes in Florida--and a mandatory recount that would add 'hanging chad' to the American political lexicon. Haggling over every ballot, Republican and Democratic campaigners waged a 36-day street fight in the Sunshine State--with the presidency of the United States as the ultimate prize.

title: The Relic
shortSummary: A ravenous, brain-eating beast stalks the shadowy halls of a large museum in this terrifying thriller.
summary: Terror stalks the hallways of a vast museum in this tense horror movie that 'boasts genuinely scary thrills' ('Variety'). Deep beneath Chicago's Natural History Museum lurks a ferocious beast with a craving for human brains. Where did it come from? Can it be stopped? A pretty biologist is determined to find out...if she can manage to stay off the creature's dinner menu!

title: Reno 911!: Miami
shortSummary: The comical Reno cops are on patrol in Miami Beach in this comedy based on the hit TV series.
summary: The comical Reno cops are on patrol in Miami Beach in this comedy based on the hit TV series. With a national police convention gathering in Miami, Reno's Lt. Jim Dangle takes his team of quirky cops to Florida. But when a security crisis quarantines the Miami force, it's up to the raucous Reno crew to take out Florida's worst offenders...including an alligator and more!

title: Restraint
shortSummary: A 'Bonnie & Clyde'-style fugitive couple hole up in an old mansion whose agoraphobic owner they take as a hostage in this twisty thriller.
summary: A 'Bonnie & Clyde'-style fugitive couple hole up in an old mansion whose agoraphobic owner they take as a hostage. But not everything is as it seems and the pair soon find the tables turned in this 'classy, beautifully photographed thriller' (Urban Cinefile).

title: The Return of the Musketeers
shortSummary: The four musketeers are reunited in this 1989 adventure in which they must save the King of England from a vengeful young woman.
summary: The four musketeers are reunited in this 1989 adventure that finds them trying to rescue the King of England from death at the hands of a vengeful young woman.

title: Ride Along
shortSummary: A diminutive security guard who wants to be a real cop goes on the beat with his future brother-in-law--a tough Atlanta PD detective.
summary: Diminutive high-school security guard Ben dreams of becoming a real cop and marrying his girlfriend, whose disapproving brother James is a tough detective with the Atlanta PD. So when Ben enters the police academy, James tries to scare him off by taking him along for a wild ride on the beat that he'll never forget. Ice Cube and Kevin Hart star.

title: Rio 2
shortSummary: Blue macaw mates Blu and Jewel go in search of their rain-forest roots on a wild Amazonian adventure in this fun-filled animated sequel.
summary: Blue macaw mates Blu and Jewel go in search of their rain-forest roots on a wild Amazonian adventure in this fun-filled animated sequel. Once in the jungle, the couple and their brood discover a huge pack of wild macaws--led by Jewel's long-lost father--and join them in a battle to save their beautiful habitat from the saws of a devious logging crew.

title: The Rite
shortSummary: Evil makes a believer out of a skeptical seminarian who is given a crash course in the rite of exorcism by veteran priest Anthony Hopkins.
summary: Evil makes a believer out of a skeptical seminarian who is given a crash course in the rite of exorcism by a veteran priest in this chiller. Sent to Rome amid a crisis of faith, Father Michael Kovak gets a wake-up call in the person of Father Lucas Trevant (Anthony Hopkins), a wily Exorcist whose battles against demonic possession force Father Michael to reconsider his beliefs.

shortTitle: A ritmo de fe (Rhythm of Faith)
title: A ritmo de fe (Rhythm of Faith)
shortSummary: A poor, but talented, dancer lands a spot as a contestant on a TV dance competition show.
summary: A poor, but talented, dancer relies on his faith to overcome obstacles and lands a spot as a contestant on a dance competition show on Dominican television.

title: Rory O'Shea Was Here
shortSummary: A hooligan with muscular dystrophy is sent to a disabled-persons facility, where he inspires another disabled man to move out with him.
summary: A hooligan with muscular dystrophy is sent to a facility, where he inspires another disabled man to move out with him. Rory arrives and befriends Michael, a young man with cerebral palsy whose speech has become nearly unintelligible. But Rory can understand Michael perfectly and gives Michael the impetus he needs to get out on his own--with Rory as his translator, of course.

title: Running Free
shortSummary: Lucky the horse narrates his own story in this unique family adventure set before and during World War I in southwestern Africa.
summary: Lucky the horse narrates his own story in this family adventure set before and during World War I in southwestern Africa. Separated from his mother after a difficult journey from Germany to Africa, Lucky grows up with an enemy--the brutal horse Caesar--and human friends, a stable boy and a native girl. His one goal is to find his mother again in this moving, panoramic drama.

title: Rush Hour
shortSummary: A no-nonsense Hong Kong detective and a wisecracking LAPD cop team up to investigate a kidnapping in Los Angeles.
summary: Jackie Chan delivers the punches and Chris Tucker delivers the punchlines in this hit action-comedy. When a visiting Chinese official's daughter is kidnapped in Los Angeles, no-nonsense Hong Kong detective Chan flies in to investigate and finds himself teamed up with wisecracking LAPD cop Tucker, who wreaks hilarious havoc on the case.

title: The Saint
shortSummary: Val Kilmer stars as the dashing mercenary who is hired by a mad Russian to steal a top-secret formula.
summary: Long before James Bond, there was The Saint: shrewd thief, master of disguises and suave lover. Now Val Kilmer stars as the dashing mercenary in The Saint's flashiest adventure yet. Hired by a mad Russian to steal a top-secret formula for cold fusion, he battles bad guys through the streets and sewers of Moscow to save the world from evil domination.

title: Save the Last Dance
shortSummary: A teen tries to fit in at an inner-city Chicago high-school after tragedy derails her dream of a dance career. Julia Stiles stars.
summary: A teen tries to fit in at an inner-city Chicago high-school after tragedy derails her dream of a dance career. Julia Stiles and Sean Patrick Thomas star in this inspiring story of overcoming adversity.

title: Scooby-Doo
shortSummary: The Mystery Mutt and his pals reunite for a spooky adventure involving ghostly doings at a haunted-house amusement park.
summary: Mystery mutt Scooby-Doo and his human pals from the beloved cartoon series are brought to dazzling life in this live-action feature. The fun begins as the Mystery Inc. gang--Fred, Daphne, Velma, Shaggy and, of course, Scooby-Doo--reunite for a spooky adventure involving a ghostly series of events at a haunted-house-themed amusement park.

title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
shortSummary: Monsters from the Mystery, Inc. gang's past return to life to provide Scooby and his groovy sleuth pals with an all-new investigation.
summary: Monsters from the Mystery, Inc. gang's past return to life to provide the groovy sleuths with a new investigation. Fred, Daphne, Velma, Shaggy and Scooby-Doo return to Coolsville when a museum opens a display of monstrous masks from their past conquests. When the ghastly ghouls begin making new appearances, it's up to the 'fraidy cats to get to the bottom of the mystery.

title: Seconds Apart
shortSummary: Tyrannical twins use their psychokinetic powers to force their victims into fatal, self-inflicted acts in this shocker.
summary: Tyrannical twins use their psychokinetic powers to force their victims into fatal, self-inflicted acts in this 'offbeat and ambitious' (Variety) shocker. It's 'The Omen' times two as these supernatural psychopaths leave bodies in their wake for their own devious designs.

title: Secretary
shortSummary: A young secretary with a history of self-mutilation takes a liking to her boss who has a fetish for administering spankings.
summary: A young secretary with a history of mental illness takes a liking to her boss who has a fetish for administering spankings in this quirky comedy. Maggie Gyllenhaal stars as the recently discharged mental patient whose purposeful slip-ups at work lead to paddlings by her domineering boss in this twisted tale.

title: Serenity
shortSummary: Joss Whedon's cult TV series 'Firefly' gets new life in this tale about the adventures of a rickety spaceship's crew in a hostile future.
summary: Joss Whedon's cult sci-fi TV series 'Firefly' gets new life in this western-style thriller that chronicles the adventures of a rickety spaceship. It's the 26th century, and the sinister Alliance has colonized the solar system. Danger awaits the crew of the rebel spaceship 'Serenity' when they pick up a doctor and his telepathic sister, who is wanted by the Alliance.

title: Serial Mom
shortSummary: Kathleen Turner is a housewife who is apple-pie perfection...except for her habit of killing anyone who makes her mad in John Waters' hit.
summary: Meet an all-American Mom with a difference! It's Kathleen Turner, going over the top as a Baltimore housewife who's so perfect it makes your teeth hurt...except for her habit of killing anyone who makes her mad. A teacher doesn't like your son? Run him over! Your daughter's boyfriend is giving her grief? Run him through with a poker! Dark, dark comedy from John Waters.

title: Sexy Beast
shortSummary: A retired gangster is dragged back into the fray in this thriller with 2001 Best Supporting Actor Oscar(R)-nominee Ben Kingsley.
summary: A retired gangster is dragged from paradise back into the fray in this 'wonderfully stylish thriller' ('Hollywood Reporter'). Gary Dove, a.k.a. Gal, is relishing his sunny retreat in Spain until the ferocious, unstoppable Don Logan (Ben Kingsley) drops by for a visit. He wants Gal to participate in an underwater heist...and when this Don makes an offer, no one refuses.

title: Shallow Hal
shortSummary: A womanizer falls for an overweight girl after a spell is cast on him that forces him to see inner beauty in this outrageous comedy.
summary: The Farrelly brothers stage the ultimate 'battle of the bulge' in this riotous comedy. Rosemary (Gwyneth Paltrow) is an obese young woman who would never seem to have anything in common with Hal (Jack Black), a pompous womanizer who only dates stick-thin beauties. But a chance encounter leaves Hal under a strange spell and sets the stage for an unlikely love affair.

title: Shattered
shortSummary: A young couple must comply with the increasingly insane demands of the sadistic kidnapper who h as taken their child in this thriller.
summary: A young couple must comply with the increasingly insane demands of the sadistic kidnapper (Pierce Brosnan) who has taken their daughter in this harrowing thriller. Gerard Butler and Maria Bello co-star as the husband and wife who find themselves driven to extremes in order to save their little girl.

title: She's Having a Baby
shortSummary: John Hughes comedy about a young couple as they experience the highs and lows of married life and starting a family.
summary: John Hughes ('The Breakfast Club') directed this “engaging domestic comedy” (Newsday) about a young couple facing the joys and trials of marriage. Kevin Bacon stars as a reluctant husband who'd like to stay a kid forever. Elizabeth McGovern plays his wife. Written and directed by John Hughes.

title: Silver Streak
shortSummary: There's murder, thrills, danger--and plenty of romance--aboard a high-speed transcontinental luxury train in this action-comedy.
summary: There's murder, thrills, danger--and plenty of romance--aboard the Silver Streak! Gene Wilder, Jill Clayburgh and Richard Pryor find themselves caught up in a dangerous mystery involving an art forgery ring in this action-comedy set on a high-speed transcontinental luxury train. Patrick McGoohan, Ned Beatty, Clifton James and Ray Walston co-star.

title: A Simple Wish
shortSummary: Martin Short is a screwball fairy godmother who becomes the accident-prone answer to a little girl's wish in this comedy.
summary: Martin Short is a screwball fairy godmother who becomes the accident-prone answer to a little girl's wish in this comedy. Eight-year-old Anabel simply wants success for her cab driver father, but oafish Murray (Short) has a broken wand and a propensity for creating a mess. Can he grant her wish while stopping a dastardly witch from ruining the fairy godmother convention?

title: The Skeleton Key
shortSummary: 'Hoodoo' magic haunts a young nurse after she takes a job caring for a disabled man in his creepy bayou plantation house.
summary: 'Hoodoo' magic haunts a young nurse after she takes a job caring for a disabled man in his creepy bayou plantation house. Caroline Ellis has no idea what she's in for when she accepts a job caring for an elderly stroke victim whose wife distrusts the nurse. Given a skeleton key to the vast mansion, Caroline begins to learn the dark truth behind the decaying old place.

title: Snow Day
shortSummary: Kids in upstate New York have a wild day of fun, pranks and misadventures thanks to a sudden, school-canceling blizzard.
summary: Kids in upstate New York have a wild day of fun, pranks and misadventures thanks to a sudden, school-canceling blizzard in this "laugh-out-loud" (Chicago Tribune) family film.

title: Someone Like You
shortSummary: Ashley Judd plays a jilted talk-show producer who falls for her roommate despite his being proof of her animal theory about men.
summary: A jilted talk-show producer uses her chauvenistic roommate as an example of her "animal" theory about men, but winds up falling in love instead in this romantic comedy. Ashley Judd plays Jane Goodale, a broken-hearted young woman who ghostwrites a column with an 'animal theory' about men. Her new roommate Eddie is a perfect example...until their attraction begins to grow!

title: Something the Lord Made
shortSummary: Fact-based story of a white surgeon and a black lab technician who revolutionized heart surgery amidst the racial injustice of the 1940s.
summary: Two men--one a wealthy white chief surgeon, the other a poor black lab technician--achieve a monumental medical breakthrough that earned one accolades...and the other a painful lesson in racism and unequal opportunity in 1940s Baltimore. Alan Rickman and Mos Def star in this 'HBO Films' drama.

title: Sometimes in April
shortSummary: Two brothers are divided by marriage and fate during the 100 horrifying days of the 1994 Rwandan genocide.
summary: In a nation decimated by ethnic rage, two brothers are divided by marriage and fate. This gripping drama based on true events focuses on the 100 horrifying days of the 1994 Rwandan genocide, when over 800,000 Tutsi people were killed by Hutu nationalists. Against this terrifying backdrop is the story of two Hutu brothers--one in the military, the other a radio personality.

title: The Special Relationship
shortSummary: The unique friendship shared by British prime minister Tony Blair and U.S. president Bill Clinton in the 1990s.
summary: They were two of the most powerful leaders of the free world who forged a loyal, if tempestuous, friendship out of the crucible of political necessity. Michael Sheen and Dennis Quaid star in the HBO Films drama that chronicles the 'special relationship' shared by British prime minister Tony Blair and U.S. president Bill Clinton in the 1990s.

title: Starter For 10
shortSummary: A brilliant young man heads to college bent on leading his school on a TV quiz show, only to get caught up in personal entanglements.
summary: A book-smart young man heads to college bent on leading his school on a TV quiz show, only to get caught up in a series of personal entanglements. James McAvoy stars as the blue-collar brainiac whose rise up the social ladder at Bristol University hits a snag when he falls for an upper-crust beauty. But can he keep it together for an appearance on 'University Challenge'?

title: A Star Is Born
shortSummary: Barbra Streisand is a singer rising to the top of the rock charts while her husband (Kris Kristofferson) struggles.
summary: A high-voltage remake of a Hollywood classic! Barbra Streisand is a singer rising to the top of the rock charts while husband Kris Kristofferson struggles to rescue a career fast sinking into oblivion. Their love story is played against a great musical score by Streisand and Paul Williams ('Evergreen' won both a 1976 Oscar(R) and a Grammy(R).

title: Star Kid
shortSummary: Spencer is the loneliest seventh-grader on earth, until an intergalactic adventure--and a magical cybersuit--totally turn his world around.
summary: Spencer is the loneliest seventh-grader on earth, until an intergalactic adventure--and a magical cybersuit--totally turn his world around.

shortTitle: Straight Outta Compton: HBO First Look
title: Straight Outta Compton: HBO First Look
shortSummary: A behind-the-scenes look at this film about the rise of the legendary rap group N.W.A. in the 1980s.
summary: A behind-the-scenes look at this film about the rise of the legendary rap group N.W.A. in the 1980s.

title: Stuart Little
shortSummary: A mouse named Stuart goes on the adventure of a lifetime after he is adopted by a human family in this live-action/animated hit.
summary: From E.B. White's book comes this fun mix of live-action and animation. The Littles (Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie) plan to adopt a baby boy, but it's love at first sight when they meet a mouse named Stuart (voice of Michael J. Fox)! The family's mean-spirited cat (voice of Nathan Lane) doesn't feel so loving though, leading Stuart to be kidnapped and taken a long way from home!

title: Stuart: A Life Backwards
shortSummary: A poignant, tragic true story that traces in reverse the events that shaped a homeless man's life.
summary: Meet Stuart Shorter. He's a homeless, delusional, psychotic, substance-abusing ex-convict. And his life story is utterly irresistible. Adapted by Alexander Masters from his award-winning biography, this HBO Films production is a poignant, tragic true story that unfolds in reverse the life of a young boy who was transformed into a violent convict and substance abuser.

title: Summer of Sam
shortSummary: Spike Lee's harrowing tale that chronicles the Son of Sam's reign of terror in 1977 NYC from the perspective of neighborhood.
summary: New York City, 1977. In a summer marked by disco, experimentation, oppressive heat and the Yankees, a nightmarish wave of violence grips the Big Apple with fear. From director Spike Lee comes this harrowing film that chronicles the Son of Sam's murderous reign of terror from the perspective of the young residents of one inner-city neighborhood.

title: The Sunset Limited
shortSummary: A black ex-con and a suicidal white professor share a philosophical debate within the confines of a New York tenement apartment.
summary: From Cormac McCarthy comes this searing drama that explores the debate between belief and atheism...afterlife and nihilism...salvation and suicide. Starring Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson and set in a New York apartment, the film focuses on a high-stakes philosophical debate between a black ex-con who claims to hear the voice of Jesus and a suicidal white professor.

title: Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2
shortSummary: A gang of super-intelligent toddlers must save the world from a global villain in this comedy sequel.
summary: A gang of super-intelligent toddlers must save the world from a global villain in this comedy sequel. These tots do more than play games--they devise a strategy to thwart the evil plans of media man Bill Biscane. Led by the super-child Kahuna, the brainy kids team up to stop Bill from launching a universal brainwashing program to take over children's minds.

title: Superman Returns
shortSummary: The Man of Steel is back to save the world from the diabolical Lex Luthor in this spectacular update of the legendary DC Comics superhero.
summary: The Man of Steel is back to save the world once again in this spectacular update of the legendary DC Comics superhero. Returning after a five-year absence, Superman faces his greatest threat from an old enemy: Lex Luthor. Can he stop the diabolical villain's evil plan before it's too late? Superman Returns TM & (C) DC COMICS INC. All Rights Reserved.

title: Super Capers
shortSummary: A would-be superhero (with no known powers) leads a group of equally dysfunctional super beings on a mission to stop an evil plot.
summary: A would-be superhero (with no known powers) leads a group of equally dysfunctional super beings on a journey through time to stop a criminal mastermind's evil plot in this comic book satire.
