title: Taking Chance
shortSummary: A military officer's life is changed after taking an assignment to escort home the body of a 19-year-old Marine killed in Iraq.
summary: In 2004, Lt. Col. Michael Strobl volunteered to escort home the body of a 19-year-old Marine killed in Iraq. It would prove to be a life-altering experience. Kevin Bacon stars as Strobl in this profoundly moving 'HBO Films' drama that looks at the military rituals for honoring its war dead from the perspective of one fallen soldier named Chance Phelps.

title: Talk Radio
shortSummary: The brash host of a Dallas radio talk show gives voice to the city's most crazy, pathetic and violent denizens.
summary: A lot of people hate Barry Champlain's guts. He's the brash host of a Dallas radio talk show that gives voice to the city's most crazy, pathetic and violent denizens. Eric Bogosian 'commands attention in a patented tour-de-force' ('Variety') as the man whose nasty mouth rubs the wrong people the wrong way.

title: Tammy
shortSummary: After getting fired and catching her husband with another woman, a woman hits the road with her randy, hard-drinking grandmother.
summary: Melissa McCarthy co-wrote and stars in this offbeat blend of comedy and drama, about a frustrated, working-class Midwesterner who, after losing her job and catching her husband with another woman, decides to hit the road with her randy, hard-drinking grandmother.

title: The Tao of Steve
shortSummary: An oafish ladies man finds himself drawn to a more serious relationship when he runs into an old schoolmate.
summary: Overweight, partially employed and terminally lazy, Dex is nonetheless a big hit with the opposite sex. Why? He has developed a philosophy of romance that is guaranteed to wow the ladies, and it works. But when he meets Syd at his 10-year high-school reunion, Dex is in need of an approach to a more serious relationship...and Syd is unimpressed by his 'Steve' act.

title: Temple Grandin
shortSummary: An autistic woman becomes an unlikely hero to America's cattle industry--and to autistic people everywhere--in this fact-based story.
summary: Claire Danes shines in this fact-based story of an autistic woman who became an unlikely hero to America's cattle industry--and to autistic people everywhere. This HBO Films production is an engaging portrait of a stigmatized, misunderstood young woman who learned to channel her unique gifts into a brilliant career as a scientist, author and groundbreaking animal advocate.

shortTitle: Tengo Ganas de Ti (I Want You)
title: Tengo Ganas de Ti (I Want You)
shortSummary: Returning to Madrid in the wake of a friend's death, a young man finds romance--only to have his first love return.
summary: Returning to Madrid in the wake of a friend's death, a young man finds romance--only to have his first love return. Mario Casas, Clara Lago and Maria Valverde star in this sequel to 'Three Meters Above the Sky.'

title: Tequila Sunrise
shortSummary: L.A. drug trafficker Mel Gibson wants to go straight--right after one last deal that pits him against old pal and cop Kurt Russell.
summary: Three of Hollywood's hottest stars form a torrid triangle in this explosive tale of danger and desire. L.A. drug trafficker Mel Gibson wants to go straight--right after one last deal that pits him against old pal and current narcotics cop Kurt Russell. When lovely Michelle Pfeiffer gets drawn into their cat-and-mouse game, the stakes become higher than anyone dared imagine.

title: Tercera Llamada (Last Call)
shortSummary: A behind-the-scenes look at a Mexican theater group, as it prepares to stage a production of Albert Camus' "Caligula."
summary: This "witty blend of farce and drama" (The Hollywood Reporter) takes a behind-the-scenes look at a Mexican theater group led by a neurotic director, as it prepares to stage a production of Albert Camus' "Caligula."

title: That Awkward Moment
shortSummary: Three commitment-phobic bros vow to stay single and avoid serious relationships at all costs., but can they stick to their pact ?
summary: Three commitment-phobic bros vow to stay single and avoid serious relationships at all costs, but can they stick to their pact in the face of so much sexy temptation?

title: That Thing You Do!
shortSummary: Director Tom Hanks turns back the clock to the rock-'n'-rolling 1960s for this story of a small Pennsylvania rock band's climb to fame.
summary: Tom Hanks made a smashing writing/directing debut with this 'immensely likable, sweet-natured tale' ('Variety'). Turning back the clock to the rock-'n'-rolling '60s, it tells of a small Pennsylvania rock band and their climb to fame. A beautifully photographed, winningly nostalgic film, sparked by that catchy title tune and winningly played by a charming cast of young actors.

shortTitle: Things We Lost in the Fire
title: Things We Lost in the Fire
shortSummary: Grieving widow Halle Berry enlivens her late husband's memory by coming to the aid of his troubled best friend in this touching film.
summary: A grieving widow enlivens her late husband's memory by coming to the aid of his troubled best friend in his time of need. Oscar(R)-winners Halle Berry and Benicio Del Toro deliver stirring performances in this touching look at loss, addiction and recovery.

shortTitle: This Is Where I Leave You
title: This Is Where I Leave You
shortSummary: Jason Bateman stars in this comedy about a cuckolded husband who joins his family in sitting shiva in the wake of his father's death.
summary: Jason Bateman heads up the cast in this comedy about a cuckolded husband who joins his family in sitting shiva in the wake of his father's death. Stuck together for seven days with his three dysfunctional siblings, outrageously open mother and a host of quirky mourners, Judd Altman (Bateman) tries to come to grips with the reality of his life amid the insanity of the week.

title: Three to Tango
shortSummary: Three love-addled Chicagoans propel this comedy of mistaken sexual identity.
summary: Three love-addled Chicagoans propel this comedy of mistaken sexual identity. Tycoon Charles Newman is looking to hire an architect. Believing that one candidate, Oscar, is gay, Charles enlists him to keep an eye on his young mistress. When Oscar meets her, it's love at first sight. But he has to sustain the charade in this 'smart and sassy comedy' ('Variety').

title: Tio Papi (Uncle Daddy)
shortSummary: A tragic accident leaves single New Yorker Joey Dedio in charge of his sister's six children in this charming comedy.
summary: A tragic accident leaves single New Yorker Joey Dedio in charge of his sister's six children in this charming comedy. Elizabeth Rodriguez, Kelly McGillis and Frankie Faison co-star.

title: Too Big to Fail
shortSummary: A gripping look at the financial crisis of 2008 from the perspective of the insiders who prevented a global economic meltdown.
summary: In the mid-2000s, Wall Street was booming: record high bonuses, multimillion-dollar salaries, a skyrocketing housing market. But in 2008, it all came crashing down. This gripping drama chronicles that unprecedented financial crisis and the inner sanctum of men and women who played key roles in preventing a global meltdown unlike anything seen before.

title: Trail of the Pink Panther
shortSummary: The Pink Panther diamond is missing again...and so is Inspector Clouseau in this sidesplitting comedy!
summary: The Pink Panther diamond is missing again...and so is Inspector Clouseau! Classic footage from previous capers combines with entire sequences never seen before of Peter Sellers as Clouseau.

title: Trainwreck: HBO First Look
shortSummary: Behind the scenes of this Judd Apatow comedy starring Amy Schumer and Bill Hader.
summary: Behind the scenes of this Judd Apatow comedy starring Amy Schumer and Bill Hader.

title: Transcendence
shortSummary: A computer scientist on the verge of a major breakthrough in advanced artificial intelligence uploads his consciousness to a supercomputer.
summary: This "bold, beautiful" (Chicago Sun-Times) sci-fi thriller stars Johnny Depp as a computer scientist on the verge of a major breakthrough in advanced artificial intelligence. But when anti-technology extremists try to thwart his work, Depp uploads his consciousness to a supercomputer, leading to an omnipotent and sentient machine that could threaten all mankind.

title: The Truman Show
shortSummary: An insurance agent doesn't know is that his life is actually a popular 24-hours-a-day TV show and his family and friends are all actors.
summary: Jim Carrey plays an insurance agent who doesn't know is that his life is actually a hugely popular, 24-hours-a-day TV show shot on a gigantic studio set, and that his family and friends are all actors!

title: The Trumpet of the Swan
shortSummary: A young trumpeter swan who can't make a sound goes on an odyssey to find his voice in this animated fable.
summary: In this animated fable, a young trumpeter swan named Louie suffers from low self-worth when he is unable to make a sound. To help him, his father steals a trumpet for him. But this makes Louie feel guilty, and starts him on an odyssey from a human school to the jazz clubs of the East Coast--all to find his voice, repay his father's debt and impress a beautiful swan.

title: The Truth About Charlie
shortSummary: A mysterious American in Paris aids a damsel in distress after her husband is murdered and she's pursued by thugs after a stash of cash.
summary: A mysterious American in Paris comes to the aid (or does he?) of a damsel in distress after her husband is murdered and she's pursued by thugs who are after a hidden stash of cash in Jonathan Demme's breezy and twist-filled remake of Stanley Donen's 1963 classic "Charade"

title: Tsunami, The Aftermath Part 1
shortSummary: Part 1 of 2. HBO Films' miniseries event that focuses on the aftermath of the tsunami that devastated the coast of Thailand in late 2004.
summary: Part 1 of 2. HBO Films in association with BBC presents this two-part miniseries event that focuses on the aftermath of the tsunami that devastated the coast of Thailand on December 26, 2004. This gripping tale of loss, survival and hope follows a group of fictional characters whose lives are irrevocably transformed by the cataclysmic destruction.

title: Tsunami, The Aftermath Part 2
shortSummary: Part 2 of 2. HBO Films' miniseries event that focuses on the aftermath of the tsunami that devastated the coast of Thailand in late 2004.
summary: Part 2 of 2. HBO Films in association with BBC presents this two-part miniseries event that focuses on the aftermath of the tsunami that devastated the coast of Thailand on December 26, 2004. This gripping tale of loss, survival and hope follows a group of fictional characters whose lives are irrevocably transformed by the cataclysmic destruction.

title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
shortSummary: The Power Rangers must defeat the evil witch Divatox to save the world from certain doom in this adventure.
summary: Can the Power Rangers save the world from certain doom? They'll have to defeat the evil space pirate Divatox to do it! It's a battle to end all battles in this fantastic adventure.

title: The Tuskegee Airmen
shortSummary: High-flying drama about the 'fighting 99th'--the first squadron of African American U.S. Army Air Corps combat fighter pilots in WWII.
summary: The 'fighting 99th' was the first squadron of African-American U.S. Army Air Corps combat fighter pilots in WWII. When they began training, few, if any, in the Army wanted them there. They had to prove that they were stronger, tougher, smarter and better fliers than most white pilots...and they did! Laurence Fishburne stars in this high-flying drama.

title: Two Night Stand
shortSummary: A mutually agreed upon one-night fling takes an unexpected turn when the two participants get snowed in together.
summary: A mutually agreed upon one-night fling takes an unexpected turn when the two participants get snowed in together. Miles Teller and Analeigh Tipton star as the 20-somethings who hook up via a dating site and soon consummate the dirty deed...only to realize they can't stand each other. Enter a blizzard that forces the pair to actually get to know one another--and maybe connect.

title: Tyson
shortSummary: The life of Mike Tyson who rocketed to the top of the boxing world before he was sidetracked by personal demons and bad advice.
summary: His talent took him from a poverty-stricken childhood on the mean streets of Brooklyn to fame--and unimaginable fortune--as the youngest heavyweight champion in boxing history. Mike Tyson was on top of the world until bad advice--and his own personal demons--turned his American dream into an American nightmare. Newcomer Michael Jai White plays Mike Tyson in this riveting film.

title: Uptown Girls
shortSummary: When a trust-fund brat loses her liquidity, she is forced to work as the ill-equipped nanny to an overly mature eight-year-old girl.
summary: When a trust-fund brat loses her liquidity, she is forced to work for the first time in her life--as the ill-equipped nanny to an overly mature eight-year-old girl. Brittany Murphy and Dakota Fanning play the polar opposites who find they have a lot to learn about growing up--and vice versa. Marley Shelton, Donald Faison and Heather Locklear co-star in this heartwarming comedy.

title: Veronica Mars
shortSummary: Veronica Mars, the  teen super-sleuth of the hit TV series, returns to investigate a shocking new murder in this big-screen adventure.
summary: Veronica Mars, the pretty, teen super-sleuth of the hit TV series, returns to investigate a shocking new murder in this thrilling big-screen adventure. Ten years after the events of the series, and just in time for her high-school reunion, Veronica (Kristen Bell) returns to Neptune, CA to investigate a former classmates murder--in which her ex Logan is the prime suspect.

title: Walking With Dinosaurs
shortSummary: A little pachyrhinosaurus becomes an unlikely hero to his herd in this epic prehistoric adventure.
summary: Prepare to enter the incredible prehistoric world of the dinosaurs in this epic adventure! With a herd of mighty pachyrhinosaurus' on the move and facing a variety of threats--including the terrifying T-Rex--it's up to one unlikely member of the group named Patchi to overcome his devious brother and lead them to safety. A 'gorgeous visual feast' (Canada.com).

title: Walkout
shortSummary: The stirring true story of Chicano students who staged a walkout to protest injustices in the high-school system in 1968 Los Angeles.
summary: This HBO Films production details the stirring true story of a group of Mexican American students who staged a compelling 1968 walkout to protest the injustices of the public high-school system in East L.A. Alexa Vega stars as an idealistic honors student whose desire to fight the system's blatant discrimination leads her to coordinate a multi-school walkout of students.

title: Walk of Shame
shortSummary: L.A. news reporter Elizabeth Banks desperately tries to make it to a big audition after getting stranded during a wild night out.
summary: Jilted and (she thinks) jobless, L.A. news reporter Meghan (Elizabeth Banks) throws caution to the wind and agrees to a night of partying that ends in a one-night stand with handsome James Marsden. Learning that she actually has a shot at a major network job, Meghan must navigate the city streets on foot--and in a tiny yellow mini-dress--to make it to her audition on time.

title: The War
shortSummary: A troubled family with a war-vet father struggles with life in a southern town in this drama.
summary: A troubled family with a war-vet father struggles with life in 1970s rural Mississippi. Stephen Simmons, a Vietnam veteran, is haunted by his experience, and it's affecting his marriage. Meanwhile, his young son and daughter face another kind of battle with the neighborhood bullies. Things come to a head during one hot summer in this moving family drama.

title: Warm Springs
shortSummary: The stirring true story of Franklin Delano Roosevelt's battle with polio in 1921.
summary: As U.S. president, he led America through the Depression and World War II. But the toughest challenge Franklin Roosevelt ever faced was one the country never saw. Kenneth Branagh stars in this true story of Roosevelt's battle after being left a paraplegic by polio. Cynthia Nixon plays his dedicated wife Eleanor, who took up the mantle of the public FDR while he sought a cure.

title: Wedding Crashers
shortSummary: Two divorce mediators who crash weddings to pick up women engage in comical misadventures at the nuptials of a politician's daughter.
summary: Two divorce mediators who crash weddings to pick up women engage in a series of increasingly riotous misadventures at the nuptials of a politician's daughter. John and Jeremy are best friends who have turned wedding-crashing--and scoring with bridesmaids--into a science. At the scene of their biggest score yet, they run into a major hitch: John falls for the bride's sister!

title: The Wedding Planner
shortSummary: Jennifer Lopez sizzles as a lonely wedding planner who discovers that the man of her dreams is about to marry her newest client.
summary: For a woman who takes the cake for creating the perfect weddings for her client couples, Mary Fiore never seems close to having her own. Jennifer Lopez stars as the wedding planner who doesn't seemed destined to walk down the aisle--until she begins to fall for a handsome, charming pediatrician (Matthew McConaughey) who is about to marry her newest client!

title: We Don't Live Here Anymore
shortSummary: Two amorous couples complicate their marriages and friendships through infidelity in this drama.
summary: Two amorous couples complicate their marriages and friendship by developing an emotional adulterous affair with each other's spouse in this drama. Jack and Terry have a genial relationship with Hank and Edith, longtime colleagues and close friends. But as the couples cultivate a new physical relationship with each other, they unleash the hidden discontent in their marriages.

title: What to Watch: August 2015
shortSummary: Check out some of the exciting programming coming to HBO in August 2015...and beyond.
summary: Check out some of the exciting programming coming to HBO in August 2015...and beyond.

title: When Trumpets Fade
shortSummary: An American soldier becomes caught up in the desperate struggle to survive during the bloodiest battle of WWII.
summary: In the winter of 1944, the bloodiest battle of WWII was fought in the Hurtgen forest near the German border. Ron Eldard ('Sleepers') heads a cast of extraordinary young actors in the story of one American soldier caught in the violence whose desperate struggle to survive brings into sharp relief the meaning of bravery and morality during war.

title: Winter's Tale
shortSummary: True love--and true evil--transcend time in this epic love story based on Mark Helprin's 1983 novel.
summary: In early 20th-century New York City, thief Peter Lake (Colin Farrell) falls for a dying girl (Jessica Brown Findlay)--a romance that his sadistic boss Pearly wants to sabotage. But in a world of angels, demons and time travel, Peter awakens in 2014 where a woman (Jennifer Connelly) helps him piece together his past...even as the malevolent Pearly continues to stalk him.

title: The Wolverine
shortSummary: A battle-weary Wolverine faces a deadly threat in Japan--minus his self-healing powers--in this thrilling installment in the series.
summary: A battle-weary Wolverine faces a deadly threat--and his own demons--in Japan in this thrilling installment in the 'Wolverine' series. Hugh Jackman returns as the haunted mutant X-man who is summoned to Japan where he winds up in battle once again--but minus the self-healing powers that have always spared him in the past.

title: Working Girl
shortSummary: Melanie Griffith is a pretty secretary who trades in her miniskirt for a business suit to prove that she's more than just a pair of legs.
summary: Can a Staten Island secretary trade in her miniskirt for a business suit and convince the corporate sharks she's more than a pair of legs? Melanie Griffith plays Tess McGill, a Wall Street Cinderella who uses her double-dealing boss Sigourney Weaver's skiing mishap to pass herself off as a major player in a business deal. And the perks include handsome Harrison Ford!

title: X-Men
shortSummary: A group of heroic mutants battle an evil mutant bent on revenge against humanity in this futuristic tale based on the comic books.
summary: From the classic comic book series comes this fantastic futuristic film about a war between two opposing factions of super-powered mutants. On one side is Professor Xavier (Patrick Stewart) who teaches mutants to use their powers for good; on the other is his arch-enemy Magneto (Ian McKellen)--whose evil plan is to lead his mutant army into war against man.

title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
shortSummary: Characters from the original X-Men movies join forces with their younger selves to go back in time to prevent their annihilation by robots.
summary: The X-Men unite in this "spectacular" (Chicago Tribune) "adrenaline-fueled" (NY Daily News) blockbuster. As gigantic Sentinel robots annihilate mutants, characters from the original X-Men movies join forces with their younger selves to go back in time and alter history before it's too late.

title: X-Men: The Last Stand
shortSummary: The discovery of an antibody that can turn mutants into normal humans results in full-scale war in this third entry in the 'X-Men' saga.
summary: An antibody that can turn mutants into normal humans results in full-scale war in this third 'X-Men' film. At the core of the controversy is a boy whose body produces the antibody. While Charles Xavier and his X-Men are leery of this new 'cure,' the wrathful Magneto and his mutants--led by the resurrected Jean Grey a.k.a. Dark Phoenix--set out to annihilate every trace of it.

title: The Year of Living Dangerously
shortSummary: A foreign correspondent and a glamorous diplomat carry on a torrid romance as a nation hovers on the brink of political violence.
summary: A foreign correspondent and a glamorous diplomat carry on a torrid romance as a nation hovers on the brink of political violence. Mel Gibson and Sigourney Weaver sizzle as the couple caught up in intrigue and revolt in sultry '60s Indonesia.

title: Yesterday
shortSummary: Oscar(R)-nominated Best Foreign Language Film about an African woman with AIDS who vows to live to see her daughter go to school.
summary: In a place where life is full of adversity, one woman shows how courage, compassion and love can change the course of tomorrow. This 2004 Oscar(R) nominee for Best Foreign Language Film puts a human face on the politics and statistics of the AIDS crisis in Africa through the story of a woman dying of the disease who vows to live to see her daughter go to school.

title: Young Frankenstein
shortSummary: Mel Brooks gives the old horror classic a riotous comic twist in this classic comedy with Gene Wilder as the mad monster-maker.
summary: Director Mel Brooks gives the old horror classic a riotous comic twist in this 1974 comedy. Gene Wilder, who co-authored the screenplay, plays the mad scientist's grandson with an unfortunate penchant for following family tradition. Peter Boyle plays the monster.

title: You Don't Know Jack
shortSummary: Al Pacino stars as Dr. Jack Kevorkian, the infamous "Doctor Death" who became the poster child for assisted suicide in the 1990s.
summary: Angel of mercy...or Doctor Death? In the 1990s, Dr. Jack Kevorkian became one of the most polarizing figures in modern American history. Al Pacino brings Dr. Death to life in 'You Don't Know Jack,' a Barry Levinson film that follows him through his first assisted suicide, the media frenzy that followed and the decade-long war of wills between Kevorkian and state prosecutors.

title: You, Me and Dupree
shortSummary: The honeymoon comes to a grinding end for two newlyweds who take in the groom's slacker best man--and can't get rid of him!
summary: The honeymoon comes to a grinding end for two newlyweds who take in the groom's slacker best man--and can't get rid of him! Dupree swears he just needs a few days to get back on his feet, but soon it's very clear to the couple that the shaggy blonde slacker has no real ambition to do anything! Will his annoying and often revolting behavior kill this longtime friendship?
